書籍簡介: Network Access Control (NAC) is an approach to computer network security that attempts to unify endpoint security technology (such as antivirus, host intrusion prevention, and vulnerability assessment), user or system authentication and network security enforcement.  This book is your ultimate resource for Network Access Control (NAC). Here you will find the most up-to-date information, analysis, background and everything you need to know.  In easy to read chapters, with extensive references and links to get you to know all there is to know about Network Access Control (NAC) right away, covering: Network Access Control, Network security, Administrative domain, AEGIS SecureConnect, Aladdin Knowledge Systems, Alert Logic, Anomaly-based intrusion detection system, Anti-pharming, Anti-phishing software, Anti-worm, Application-level gateway, ARP spoofing, Asprox botnet, Attack (computer), Attack tree, Authentication server, Avaya Secure Network Access, Avaya VPN Router, Bagle (computer worm), Barracuda Networks, Bastion host, Black hole (networking), BLACKER, Blue Cube Security, BNC (software), Botnet, BredoLab botnet, Bro (software), Byzantine Foothold, Captive portal, Capture the flag, Check Point, Check Point Abra, Check Point VPN-1, Christmas tree packet, Cisco ASA, Cisco Global Exploiter, Cisco PIX, Cisco Secure Integrated Software, Cisco Security Agent, Cisco Systems VPN Client, Clear Channel Assessment attack, Client Puzzle Protocol, Cloudvpn, Codenomicon, Columbitech, Computer security, Context-based access control, ContraVirus, Core Impact, Core Security, Countermeasure (computer), Cryptek, Cutwail botnet, CVSS, CyberCIEGE, Dark Internet, Data breach, Deep packet inspection, Defense in depth (computing), Denial-of-service attack, Device fingerprint, DHIPDS, Differentiated security, Digital Postmarks, Digital security, Distributed firewall, DMZ (computing), DNS hijacking, Donbot botnet, Dual-homed, Egress filtering, Entrust, Evil bit, Extensible Threat Management (XTM), Extranet, Fail2ban, Fake AP, Finjan, Firewalk (computing), Firewall (computing), Firewall pinhole, Firewalls and Internet Security, Fortinet, Forward-confirmed reverse DNS, General Dynamics C4 Systems, Generalized TTL security mechanism, Global Internet Freedom Consortium, Golden Frog Inc, Greynet, Grum botnet, Guided tour puzzle protocol, Gumblar, Hole punching, Honeyd, HoneyMonkey, Honeynet Project, Honeypot (computing), Honeytoken, Host Identity Protocol, ICMP hole punching, Identity driven networking, IEC 62351, IEEE 802.1X, IF-MAP, Ingress filtering, Institute for Applied Network Security, Integrated Windows Authentication, Inter-protocol communication, Inter-protocol exploitation, Internet censorship, Internet security, Internet Storm Center, IntruShield, Network intrusion detection system, Intrusion prevention system, IP address spoofing, IP blocking, IP fragmentation attacks, Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kerberos (protocol), Kerio Control, Key distribution center, Knowledge-based authentication, Kraken botnet, Lethic botnet, List of cyber attack threat trends, Lock-Keeper, Lorcon, Lumeta Corporation, MAC flooding, Managed security service, Managed VoIP Service, Mariposa botnet, Mega-D botnet, Messaging Security, Metasploit Project, Middlebox, Miredo, Mobile virtual private network, Monoculture (computer science), Mu Dynamics, MySecureCyberspace, NAT traversal, NeoAccel, NetBox Blue, Network Admission Control, Network Based Application Recognition, Network encryption cracking, Network intelligence, Network security policy, Network Security Toolkit, Nfront security, NIST RBAC model, NTLM, Null session, OCML...and much more  This book explains in-depth the real drivers and workings of Network Access Control (NAC). It reduces the risk of your technology, time and resources investment decisions by enabling you to compare your understanding of Network Access Control (NAC) with the objectivity of experienced professionals.

書名: DATO Diagnostic Scenarios Access Codes
書籍簡介: DELMAR AUTOMOTIVE TRAINING ONLINE - DIAGNOSTIC SCENARIOS (DATO) creates a rich-media learning experience and challenges learners to master diagnostic and repair practices in 62 realistic scenarios that span all systems areas. Combining sound instructional design with top-quality photographs and videos, as well as necessary manufacturer information, learners develop critical thinking skills and apply them to real-world customer concerns. Each scenario addresses a simulated problem on a specific vehicle and teaches students to use a structured 8-step diagnostic process that starts with a customer-stated concern on a repair order and ends with repair verification. In keeping with ASE Education Foundation requirements, DATO's Learning Management System capabilities track, record and report each learner's progress.

書籍簡介: The first guide to planning and performing a physical penetration test on your computer's security Most IT security teams concentrate on keeping networks and systems safe from attacks from the outside-but what if your attacker was on the inside? While nearly all IT teams perform a variety of network and application penetration testing procedures, an audit and test of the physical location has not been as prevalent. IT teams are now increasingly requesting physical penetration tests, but there is little available in terms of training. The goal of the test is to demonstrate any deficiencies in operating procedures concerning physical security. Featuring a Foreword written by world-renowned hacker Kevin D. Mitnick and lead author of The Art of Intrusion and The Art of Deception, this book is the first guide to planning and performing a physical penetration test. Inside, IT security expert Wil Allsopp guides you through the entire process from gathering intelligence, getting inside, dealing with threats, staying hidden (often in plain sight), and getting access to networks and data.  Teaches IT security teams how to break into their own facility in order to defend against such attacks, which is often overlooked by IT security teams but is of critical importance Deals with intelligence gathering, such as getting access building blueprints and satellite imagery, hacking security cameras, planting bugs, and eavesdropping on security channels Includes safeguards for consultants paid to probe facilities unbeknown to staff Covers preparing the report and presenting it to management  In order to defend data, you need to think like a thief-let Unauthorised Access show you how to get inside.

書籍簡介: ConnectPlus offers an interactive and inexpensive electronic textbook integrated within the homework platform. By choosing ConnectPlus, your students receive: Online eBook, allowing students to access "Physical Science" anytime, anywhere. Within the ebook students will find animations, Inline assessment quizzes, and rollover answers for the in-chapter, follow-up Examples. Students and instructors will appreciate the Community Notes for student-to-student or instructor-to-student note sharing to greatly enhance the user learning experience. Online homework system gives students the means to better connect with their coursework, with their instructors, and with the important concepts that they will need to know for success now and in the future. With Connect, instructors can deliver assignments, quizzes and tests online. The Questions for Thought and the Parallel Exercises from the text are presented in an auto-gradable format. Instructors can edit existing questions and author entirely new problems. Track individual student performance - by question, assignment or in relation to the class overall - with detailed grade reports. Integrate grade reports easily with Learning Management Systems (LMS) such as WebCT and Blackboard. And much more.

書名: Dato Cl Hosted Printed Access Card
書籍簡介: DELMAR AUTOMOTIVE TRAINING ONLINE - DIAGNOSTIC SCENARIOS is a groundbreaking online training program that creates a rich-media learning experience for students by challenging them to learn approved diagnostic and repair practices in 62 realistic scenarios that span all systems areas. By combining strong pedagogy along with real-world experiences, students will improve critical thinking and problem-solving skills through this interactive program. Each scenario addresses a simulated problem on a specific vehicle and teaches students to use an 8-step diagnostic process leading to a successful repair while coaching them with tips. DATO puts students in the role of technicians employed by "All Tech Automotive." It employs Flash animations, a wide variety of interactive features and live-action video to create a simulated but realistic modern repair facility. Students use available tools and diagnostic equipment, animated instrument panels, and service information to diagnose and repair vehicles. This is same approach used by manufacturers to train their own technicians that has been adapted to the needs and expectations of student learners. DATO challenges students to solve real problems on real vehicles from Ford, Chevrolet, Chrysler, Toyota, Honda and Hyundai. DATO minimizes on-screen reading and maximizes student engagement by requiring students to prove that they've done the critical thinking and problem-solving involved in problem diagnosis. DATO Diagnostic Scenarios System Requirements Intel Pentium II 450MHz or faster processor (or equivalent) 128MB of RAM Microsoft Windows Vista, Microsoft Windows XP, Mac OSX 10.5, 10.6 Graphics adapter with Minimum 1024 x 768 display resolution, 32 bit depth Minimum Display Resolution 1024 x 768 Broadband Internet Connection Internet Explorer 6.x, 7.x, or Firefox 2.x, Firefox 3.x, Safari 3.x, 4.x, 5.x Popup blocking software disabled Flash Player 10.x Recommended: Local or Network Printer

Key Book Benefits: Delivers authoritative, field-tested best practices for working with Gamification. Covers the full lifecycle, from planning, design, and deployment. Includes access to download of complete set of documents as discussed in the book, and more. The instantly downloadable documents are editable and can be used straight away . Comes with job aids, utilities, and full downloads of all documents.  Drive Better Productivity and Increase Success with this book - Starting Now.  Discover Real-World Best Practices-Without Paying Expensive Consultants  You're investing in Gamification for one reason: to drive major performance improvements across your entire organization. Gamification Best Practices will help you do just that. Drawing on their experience with dozens of deployments, The Art of Service offers expert guidance on every aspect of Gamification deployment, with results-focused best practices for every area of the organization touched by the Gamification, including sales, marketing, customer service, finance, legal, and IT.  This is information you'd otherwise have to pay a consultant top dollars to get...information you won't find in any other book!  The Art of Service walks you through developing a comprehensive and effective implementation strategy, followed by tactics and specifics to overcome every challenge you face, including internal politics. Through this book and its companion Web site, The Art of Service provides presentations, questionnaires, step-by-step guides, and extensive resources-all part of the Content on Demand system that gives your organization maximum results from Gamification.  - Achieve higher end-customer satisfaction and dramatic productivity gains  - Use the Art of Service Maturity Model to assess readiness, fill gaps, and gain early, deep user adoption  - Overcome "people, product, and process" pitfalls that can limit the value of your Gamification  - Learn which procedures, processes and documentation are right for your implementation  - This book's start-to-finish roadmap for success can be used by companies of all sizes in all industries for executives, team leaders, implementation team members, developers, and users throughout the business.  From Overwhelmed to Empowered - Changing the way you find Answers - This book includes access to The Art of Service's on-demand digital library to Search, Download, Learn, Edit and Use direct applicable documents for technology and business professionals, eliminating spending money and time on self-development.  Every day, many large enterprises run hundreds of projects using The Art of Service Documentation. For these companies, The Art of Service is ideal for their custom project development, quality assurance, IT Service Management implementation, virtual training, or documentation.  The Art of Service Content-on-Demand is unique. With The Art of Service, users get the documents and the knowledge they need and IT managers get complete visibility and management control over project deployments. Get Your Access Today.

書籍簡介: KEY MESSAGE: David Krogh's Biology: A Guide to the Natural World leads readers on a memorable journey through the world of biology, using relevant examples, clearly-developed illustrations, and helpful insights that resonate with today's readers. Widely-recognized as a book that provides enjoyable reading, the Fifth Edition has been thoroughly updated with new discussions on social concerns and health applications, along with streamlined chapter summaries and expanded review questions. To address different learning styles, the book's clear illustrations and exercises are reinforced with the engaging, efficient MasteringBiology(R) learning and assessment program and a full suite of instructor resources.    KEY TOPICS: Science as a Way of Learning: A Guide to the Natural World; Fundamental Building Blocks: Chemistry, Water, and pH; Life's Components: Biological Molecules; Life's Home: The Cell; Life's Border: The Plasma Membrane; Life's Mainspring: An Introduction to Energy; Vital Harvest: Deriving Energy from Food; The Green World's Gift: Photosynthesis; The Links in Life's Chain: Genetics and Cell Division; Preparing for Sexual Reproduction: Meiosis; The First Geneticist: Mendel and His Discoveries; Units of Heredity: Chromosomes and Inheritance; Passing On Life's Information: DNA Structure and Replication; How Proteins Are Made: Genetic Transcription, Translation, and Regulation; The Future Isn't What It Used to Be: Biotechnology; An Introduction to Evolution: Charles Darwin, Evolutionary Thought, and the Evidence for Evolution; The Means of Evolution: Microevolution; The Outcomes of Evolution: Macroevolution; A Slow Unfolding: The History of Life on Earth; Arriving Late, Traveling Far: The Evolution of Human Beings; Viruses, Bacteria, Archaea, and Protists: The Diversity of Life 1; Fungi: The Diversity of Life 2; Animals: The Diversity of Life 3; Plants: The Diversity of Life 4; The Angiosperms: Form and Function in Flowering Plants; Body Support and Movement: The Integumentary, Skeletal, and Muscular Systems; Communication and Control 1: The Nervous System; Communication and Control 2: The Endocrine System; Defending the Body: The Immune System; Transport and Exchange 1: Blood and Breath; Transport and Exchange 2: Digestion, Nutrition, and Elimination; An Amazingly Detailed Script: Animal Development; How the Baby Came to Be: Human Reproduction; An Interactive Living World 1: Populations in Ecology; An Interactive Living World 2: Communities in Ecology; An Interactive Living World 3: Ecosystems and Biomes MARKET: For all readers interested in taking a memorable journey through the world of biology.

書籍簡介: ※更多書籍資訊請到www.bookcity.com.tw網站Access 2010是微軟推出的最新版本關聯式資料庫管理系統（RDBMS,即Relational Database Management System），是Office系列應用軟體之一。其提供了資料表、查詢、表單、報表、巨集、模組等物件用來建立資料庫系統的管理與應用；提供了多種精靈、運算式建立器、範本、資料儲存、資料查詢、介面設計、報表建立等規範化操作，為建立功能完整的資料庫管理系統提供了便捷的支援與服務，讓使用者不必編寫程式碼就可以完成大部分資料管理的工作。本書課程規劃從資料表、查詢、表單、報表、巨集等物件的建立，精靈、運算式建立器、範本等工具的應用，到最終完整的使用者介面建構，即使是初學者也可以輕鬆製作出專業的管理介面與報表。課程內容特別針對Access入門讀者的學習安排，也非常適合會計財務、資訊管理等辦公室人員學習使用。全書均採用實務應用範例進行課程演練，為讀者詳細講述Access 2010的各種應用與操作技巧，希望透過本書的學習，讓您不只是熟悉軟體的操作，還能快速將所學的知識輕鬆應用於實際工作之中。

Questions from the text are presented in an auto-gradable format and tied to the text's learning objectives. Instructors can edit existing questions and author entirely new problems. They also can track individual student performance--by question, assignment, or in relation to the class overall--with detailed grade reports. Integrate grade reports easily with Learning Management Systems (LMS) such as WebCT and Blackboard. And much more. By choosing Connect Chemistry, instructors are providing their students with a powerful tool for improving academic performance and truly mastering course material. Connect Chemistry allows students to practice important skills at their own pace and on their own schedule. Importantly, students' assessment results and instructors' feedback are all saved online--so students can continually review their progress and plot their course to success.

Questions are formatted in either multiple choice or open-ended numeric entry, with a variety of static and randomized, algorithmic versions. Instructors can edit existing questions or author entirely new problems. Track individual student performance--by question, assignment, or in relation to the class overall--with detailed, exportable grade reports. Additionally, ConnectPlus provides students 24/7 access to an interactive eBook--an online edition of the " Chemistry in Context " text. Included within ConnectPlus is LearnSmart(TM)! LearnSmart is an intelligent learning system that uses a series of adaptive questions to pinpoint each student's knowledge gaps. LearnSmart then provides an optimal learning path for each student, so that they spend less time in areas they already know and more time in areas they don't.

動畫圖解資料庫系統理論－使用Access 2010實作（第二版）（附影音光碟）
書籍簡介:
0.本書光碟附有「各章數位影音教材」、「SCORM教材(國際教材標準)」

	1.學習目標：每一章的最前面都有引言來說明學習目標，以啟發學習動機。

	2.圖解說明：利用圖文並茂來說明「資料庫」的概念知識。

	3.單元評量：每「單元」後附有單元導向來評量測驗。讓授課老師可以針對某一單元來命題。

	4.課後評量：每「章節」最後附有「基本題」與「進階題」，課後的適性化評量機制，協助讀者課後練習與自我測驗。

	5.教師手冊：包括「教學投影片」、「單元評量」及「課後評量」之完整解答。

	6.適用軟體工具及語言：Access 2010／VB 2010 

	 

	由於資訊化時代的到來，使得各行各業對資訊人才的需求急速增加，因此在多所學校皆有設立「資訊系所」，每年則產出上萬個資訊人員，如何在這麼競爭的環境中取得優勢，那就必須要將在學校時所學的「理論」加以「實務化」，才能與外界的企業環境整合。因此，透過本書的介紹將帶領各位讀者從「理論派」轉換為「理論派+實務派」，如此，才能在畢業之後，在工作職場上百戰百勝。

書籍簡介: The ultimate handbook for Excel analysts who need reporting solutions using Access Excel and Access are intended to work together. This book offers a comprehensive review of the extensive analytical and reporting functionality that Access provides and how it enhances Excel reporting functions. Sales managers, operations analysts, administrative assistants, office managers, and many others who rely heavily on data can benefit from learning to integrate Excel and Access, and this book shows you how. Coverage includes:   Data Analysis in Access & the Basics of Access Beyond Select Queries Transforming Your Data with Access Working with Calculations and Dates Performing Conditional Analysis Adding Dimension with Subqueries and Domain Aggregate Functions Running Descriptive Statistics in Access Scheduling and Running Batch Analysis Leveraging VBA to Enhance Data Analysis Reports, Dashboards, and Visualization in Access Presenting Data with Access Reports Using Pivot Tables and Pivot Charts in Access Enhancing Queries and Reports with Visualizations Advanced Excel and Access Integration Techniques Getting Access Data into Excel Using VBA to Move Data between Excel and Access Exploring Excel and Access Automation Integrating Excel and Access with XML Integrating Excel and Other Ofﬁce Applications Access VBA Fundamentals Understanding and Using SQL and more!  The Excel Analyst's Guide to Access helps you get more from both applications. Note:  CD-ROM/DVD and other supplementary materials are not included as part of eBook file.

書籍簡介: 用Access 2010做一套你的進銷存管理系統！Access 2010，一個看似簡易，實際上功能強大的資料庫應用軟體，作者以10餘個表單與34支報表，讓您透過「複製成功」的設計方式，掌握Access 2010完成「進銷存管理系統」的精隨，進而輕鬆管理手邊龐大的資料，設計出符合自己需求的解決方案。本書討論以下精彩主題：◎資料庫設計的觀念與方法◎熟悉Access 2010各種資料庫物件的操作與應用◎SQL的設計技巧◎VBA程式設計無痛學習◎同步更新相關資料表記錄的技巧◎大型進銷存管理系統專案實作本書特色＊本書將帶領您一步一步地設計出松崗書局進銷存管理系統。這套系統是一套可以真正上線使用的大型系統。這個系統包括了進貨作業、銷貨作業、庫存管理、應收帳款、應付帳款等五大模組，共有超過34種報表與14種表單。＊以「進銷存管理系統」大型專案的實作來讓您驗證學習的成果，讓您的Access 2010不再是豪華版的文書處理軟體。＊內容含括超過10餘個表單與 34支報表，讓您透過「複製成功」的設計方式，一手掌握Access 2010的設計精隨。

書籍簡介: McGraw-Hill's Connect for Environmental Science is a web-based assignment platform that gives students the means to better connect with their coursework, with their instructors, and with the important concepts that they will need to know for success now and in the future. With Connect, instructors can deliver assignments, quizzes and tests online. Nearly all the questions from the text are presented in an auto-gradable format and tied to the text's learning objectives. Instructors can edit existing questions and author entirely new problems. Track individual student performance - by question, assignment or in relation to the class overall - with detailed grade reports that are easily exportable. By choosing Connect, instructors are providing their students with a powerful tool for improving academic performance and truly mastering course material. Connect allows students to practice important skills at their own pace and on their own schedule. Importantly, students' assessment results and instructors' feedback are all saved online - so students can continually review their progress and plot their course to success. With ConnectPlus, students receive an innovative and inexpensive electronic textbook integrated within the Connect platform. ConnectPlus provides students with online assignments and assessments and 24/7 online access to an eBook--an online edition of the "Environmental Science" text. NEW for CONNECT: McGraw-Hill Higher Education and Blackboard(R) have teamed up!"What does this mean for you? " Life simplified. Now, all McGraw-Hill content (text, tools, & homework) can be accessed directly from within your Blackboard course. All with one sign-on. Deep integration. McGraw-Hill's content and content engines are seamlessly woven within your Blackboard course. No more manual synching! Connect(TM) assignments within Blackboard automatically (and instantly) feed grades directly to your Blackboard grade center. No more keeping track of two gradebooks! A solution for everyone. Even if your institution is not currently using Blackboard, we have a solution for you. Ask your McGraw-Hill representative for details.

書籍簡介: The all-in-one reference to all aspects of Microsoft Access 2010 If you want to learn Microsoft Access inside and out, the nine minibooks in this easy-access reference are exactly what you need. Read the book cover to cover, or jump into any of the minibooks for the instruction and topics you need most. Learn how to connect Access to SQL Server, manipulate your data locally, use nifty new features from Office 2010 such as the enhanced Ribbon, create queries and macros like a champ, and much more. From the basics to advanced functions, it's what you need to make Access more accesssible.  Shows you how to store, organize, view, analyze, and share data using Microsoft Access 2010, the database application included with Microsoft Office 2010 Includes nine minibooks that cover such topics as database design, tables, queries, forms, reports, macros, database administration, securing data, programming with Visual Basic for Applications (VBA), and using Access with the Web Helps you build database solutions that integrate with the Web and other enterprise data sources Offers plenty of techniques, tips, and tricks to help you get the most out of Access  This all-in-one guide contains everything you need to start power-using Access 2010!

書籍簡介: 無一個企業的所有商業行為紀錄皆會儲存於『資料庫管理系統』(Database Management System, 簡稱DBMS)，只是面對一般瑣碎且龐大的原始資料，該如何挖掘資料庫內有效的資訊呢？本書將以Access 2010 為資料庫開發環境，從最基本的資料表建立到查詢上，以『圖解』和『範例』的方式來帶領進入資料庫的世界，最後再透過Access與辦公室軟體結合來活用資料庫，展現資料的重複使用性，進而有效地將資料轉換成企業決策的資訊。本書特色■以資料庫觀念為基礎，搭配Access 2010操作環境，初學者容易上手■重視資料庫設計與正規化管理，建立關聯資料庫無懈可擊■強化資料庫的合併概念，設計實用的表單查詢■結合Word的『合併列印』，達到資料分享與重複使用性■結合Excel的『樞紐分析』，將繁雜的銷售資料轉為決策分析■運用『80/20法則』的統計圖表，迅速分析出產品價值■探討Office軟體與SQL Server之間的連結關係，透過中介軟體ODBC加以連線使用■介紹Access與SQL Server資料庫之間的資料連結、轉移、匯入和匯出

易習Access 2003資料庫管理（附範例VCD）
書籍簡介: 為什麼需要有Microsoft Office？為了因應未來劇烈變化又難以預測的網路世界，它已從個人產能產品套件跨足發展成更兼具全面性和整合性的系統。新版的Microsoft Office 2003包括伺服器、服務和桌面程式，在設計上相輔相乘，有助於商務用戶更容易存取商務資訊，強化組織預測、管理和掌握商場變化的能力、增加個人與團隊的工作效率，也可以改善個人產能、提升競爭力。在這個講究效率的資訊時代，如果不多學一門技術和撇步，恐怕很難有足夠的實力與人一較高下，結果就是被滾滾潮流淹沒而隨波逐流。你對Access夠瞭解嗎？其實它的功用大得很，雖然Access並不如Word、Excel容易操作使用，應用的觀念也迥異不同。但是對第一次接觸到資料庫的人而言，Access倒不失為一個相當容易上手的資料庫軟體。資料庫設計？近年來電腦科技的發展，帶動了企業e化的行動與口號，而資料庫就是這股e化風潮的最佳人選，如果能夠善用資料庫，迎接知識經濟時代對您而言根本易如反掌。事實上，資料庫在一般生活應用層面也相當廣泛，絕非八竿子打不著的表親，從簡單的通訊錄到複雜的會計報表，其實它都可以派上用場，這事兒如果不說明白，恐怕您就莫宰羊囉！Access與其他Office軟體一樣，擁有簡單易用的操作界面、方便實用的功能，只要配合書中功能的介紹解說，以及範例檔案的試作，學習Access的操控與應用，將不再是一件難事。想要學好Access嗎？我們將透過本書深入淺出的說明，讓您習得軟體的基本操控能力，更充分掌握Access的特性以及應用技巧，為您在資料庫這一條學習大路上，指引明確的方向，也越來越喜歡與Access為伍。

書籍簡介: McGraw-Hill Connect(TM)is a web-based, interactive assignment and assessment platform that incorporates cognitive science to customize the learning process. The chemical drawing tool found within Connect Chemistry is CambridgeSoft's ChemDraw, which is widely considered the "gold standard" of scientifi c drawing programs and the cornerstone application for scientists who draw and annotate molecules, reactions, and pathways. This collaboration of Connect and ChemDraw features an easy-to-use, intuitive and comprehensive course management and homework system with professional-grade drawing capabilities. End-of-chapter problems from this textbook are served up in Connect for instructors to build assignments that are automatically graded and tracked through reports that export easily to Excel. Within Connect, instructors can also create and share materials with colleagues. Ask your McGraw-Hill representative for more information, and then check it out at www.mcgrawhillconnect.com/chemistry. Housed inside Connect is McGraw-Hill Tegrity Campus. Tegrity records and distributes your lecture with just a click of a button. Students can view anytime/anywhere via computer, iPod, or mobile device. Tegrity indexes as it records your slideshow presentations and anything shown on your computer, so students can use keywords to find exactly what they want to study.

快快樂樂學Access 2010：善用高效率、方便強大的資料庫管理
書籍簡介: 善用高效率、方便、強大的資料庫管理 。在雜亂的資料中如何應用一致的規則進行整理？ 。如何由龐大的資料中尋找、分析出有效的資料？ 。如何應用表單、報表等工具，製作出專業的管理介面與報表？ 。巨集、VBA太可怕，如何寫出好程式？ 。如何將資料庫的資源整合到 Office 2010 中？ 以實用的範例與連貫的操作帶您進入Access 2010 的應用大門！ 資料庫的學習已經是目前生活及職場上相當重要的功課，善用蒐集的資料進行查詢、管理及分析是企業中相當重要的工作。Access 2010 的出現為資料庫應用、設計與部署上提供了一個方便而強大的解決方法，讓使用者可以快速的在本機或是網路上應用或管理資料庫。 在學習之前，本書將針對資料庫的結構與資料表物件的特性進行詳細的說明，引導讀者建立一個全新的資料庫檔案。 資料庫會隨著記錄的累積而與日俱增，善用尋找、取代、排序、篩選，或是功能更強大的查詢，再搭配關聯式資料庫的運用，更可以讓使用者在瀏覽資料時能隨查隨得，無往不利。 表單可針對某一個資料表或查詢產生特定的操作介面，更可依照喜好讓介面更有個性，讓使用者在輸入資料時不但方便，更可提高工作效率。 報表是組織及呈現 Access 資料庫資料的最好方式，在製作時可以套用資料表或查詢物件，以供列印或顯示在畫面上進行檢視。除此外，報表還可以運用資料庫內容製作出標籤與明信片。 巨集與VBA程式設計可以創造專業又便捷的指令按鈕與程式功能，讓資料庫發揮超高效能。善用巨集可讓你在短時間內開發出實用有效的程式，若遇到在 Access 中並沒有內建的功能，或是操作結合多個不同功能的工作時，就必須倚賴 VBA 程式設計了。 Access 與其他軟體之間的資料交換與整合，能將不同類別、來源的資料內容統合在 Aceess 資料庫中，除了互通有無，還能整合分析出更有用的資料。最後將分享一些 Access 操作密技、實用方法，更有效率的完成工作。 相信只要活用並了解本書的範例與內容，必能為您的生活與職場帶來更多助益。

書籍簡介: DELMAR AUTOMOTIVE TRAINING ONLINE - DIAGNOSTIC SCENARIOS is a groundbreaking online training program that creates a rich-media learning experience for students by challenging them to learn approved diagnostic and repair practices in 62 realistic scenarios that span all systems areas. By combining strong pedagogy along with real-world experiences, students will improve critical thinking and problem-solving skills through this interactive program. Each scenario addresses a simulated problem on a specific vehicle and teaches students to use an 8-step diagnostic process leading to a successful repair while coaching them with tips. DATO puts students in the role of technicians employed by "All Tech Automotive." It employs Flash animations, a wide variety of interactive features and live-action video to create a simulated but realistic modern repair facility. Students use available tools and diagnostic equipment, animated instrument panels, and service information to diagnose and repair vehicles. This is same approach used by manufacturers to train their own technicians that has been adapted to the needs and expectations of student learners. DATO challenges students to solve real problems on real vehicles from Ford, Chevrolet, Chrysler, Toyota, Honda and Hyundai. DATO minimizes on-screen reading and maximizes student engagement by requiring students to prove that they've done the critical thinking and problem-solving involved in problem diagnosis. DATO Diagnostic Scenarios System Requirements Intel Pentium II 450MHz or faster processor (or equivalent) 128MB of RAM Microsoft Windows Vista, Microsoft Windows XP, Mac OSX 10.5, 10.6 Graphics adapter with Minimum 1024 x 768 display resolution, 32 bit depth Minimum Display Resolution 1024 x 768 Broadband Internet Connection Internet Explorer 6.x, 7.x, or Firefox 2.x, Firefox 3.x, Safari 3.x, 4.x, 5.x Popup blocking software disabled Flash Player 10.x Recommended: Local or Network Printer

Access 2007
書籍簡介: Compared to industrial-strength database products such as Microsoft's SQL Server, Access is a breeze to use. It runs on PCs rather than servers and is ideal for small- to mid-sized businesses and households. But Access is still intimidating to learn. It doesn't help that each new version crammed in yet another set of features; so many, in fact, that even the pros don't know where to find them all. Access 2007 breaks this pattern with some of the most dramatic changes users have seen since Office 95. Most obvious is the thoroughly redesigned user interface, with its tabbed toolbar (or "Ribbon") that makes features easy to locate and use. The features list also includes several long-awaited changes. One thing that hasn't improved is Microsoft's documentation. To learn the ins and outs of all the features in Access 2007, Microsoft merely offers online help.Access 2007: The Missing Manual was written from the ground up for this redesigned application. You will learn how to design complete databases, maintain them, search for valuable nuggets of information, and build attractive forms for quick-and-easy data entry. You'll even delve into the black art of Access programming (including macros and Visual Basic), and pick up valuable tricks and techniques to automate common tasks -- even if you've never touched a line of code before. You will also learn all about the new prebuilt databases you can customize to fit your needs, and how the new complex data feature will simplify your life. With plenty of downloadable examples, this objective and witty book will turn an Access neophyte into a true master.

Designed within a simulation format, guided activities provide step-by-step instructions, self-graded quizzes, and self-designed activities in which students can plan their procedures around an experimental question and write up their results in the form of a lab report that can be submitted for evaluation. Working online, students do not have to hassle with setting up expensive equipment and waiting for results. The 14 VBL modules are available as a set or individually on their own, and can be packaged with any Brooks/Cole Cengage Learning text.

書籍簡介: Application Development with Microsoft(R) Access 2007  Live Lessons  Microsoft Access/Databases  For Access power users, programmers, and anyone who wants to master Access 2007 development fast.  In Application Development with Access 2007, renowned Access developer, trainer, and author Alison Balter teaches all the skills you  need to build professional-quality Access 2007 applications.   This package brings together more than twelve hours of personalized, expert video training: 100+ quick, practical video lessons that demonstrate all the skills you need to build virtually any Access application. You'll learn one step at a time, at your own pace--using hands-on examples that reflect realistic development challenges and showcase Access 2007's remarkable capabilities.   Application Development with Access 2007 delivers the power of the best classroom training at a small fraction of the cost. If you don't  have time to read a huge book on Access development, this is exactly what you've been searching for!  Looking for a better way to master today's rapidly changing programming technologies? Want expert help, but don't have the time or energy to read a book? Can't find classroom training worth the money? Discover LiveLessons: self-paced, personal video instruction from the world's leading technology experts.   LiveLessons are video courses, on DVD with a book supplement, that are organized into bite-sized, self-contained sessions--you'll learn key skills in as little as fifteen minutes! Each lesson begins with well-defined learning objectives and ends with comprehensive summaries, which help you track your progress. Follow along as your instructor shows how to get results in today's top development environments: including Microsoft's Visual Studio and eclipse.org's Eclipse.    "We are reaching more and more for video alternatives because they make sense! The imprints of Pearson Technology Group are the most trusted source of quality technology books, and they will be the brands we turn to for visual learning." --Leo J. Hauguel, Information Security Analyst 5 Wells Fargo Services Company  Alison Balter, one of the world's most experienced Access developers and trainers, has created Access applications ranging from small end-user projects to enterprise-wide systems. Her thirteen books on Access include Alison Balter's Mastering Microsoft Office Access 2007 Development.  System Requirements  Operating System: Windows 98, 2000, XP, or Vista; Mac OS X; versions of Linux with the Flash 8 Player or later Multimedia: DVD drive, an 800x600 or higher display, and sound card with speakers Computer: 500MHz or higher, 128MB RAM or more

書名: Access 2010程式設計-VBA、SQL、ADO、應用程式封裝/部署與系統開發實務
書籍簡介: 獻給 想開發Access資料庫系統不再跛腳的您！本書專為想要深入學習運用Access開發資料庫系統的讀者設計，內容可分為兩部分，一是VBA程式設計，二是包含開發Access資料庫系統的相關技術。VBA程式設計的部分，包含VBA基本語法、事件、Access物件模型、SQL、ADO、ADOX、JRO、錯誤處理，乃至於ActiveX、API函數的應用。系統開發相關技術的部分包含工作環境的自訂、說明檔的製作以及應用系統的封裝及部署…等。本書的焦點將放在基礎能力的建立與實例應用上，相信這本書的內容，絕對是相當實際，而不虛華。尤其是第14章的進銷存系統範例，用了140多頁的篇幅詳細說明系統的每個環節與技術，相信單單這一章的內容就可讓您值回票價。本書特色詳細說明事件驅動觀念、VBA基本語法、Access物件模型應用，輕鬆學習基本功夫強力介紹SQL語言，讓您不旦學會Access程式設計，更學會標準資料庫操作語言深入探索ADO物件模型，資料庫引擎操作從此得心應手特別放送ActiveX控制項、API函數、ADOX物件與JRO物件之應用，貨真價實童叟無欺，肯定物超所值說明如何運用功能區機制，建立操作資料庫的自訂介面，讓您開發的資料庫系統保證又嗆又炫，有模有樣詳實介紹強力捍衛資料庫設計的安全性層級機制，資料庫系統安全自此高枕無憂，那怕駭客魔高一丈範例眾多，程式設計強調實務技巧，創意十足徹底實踐程式碼逐句註解，程式範例閱讀無障礙，所有環節徹底追究，打破沙鍋，絕不含糊帶過介紹如何製作與Access資料庫系統搭配的說明檔，獨家首創，別本沒有強力介紹如何將完成開發的資料庫系統，封裝為安裝程式，並製作可自動執行之系統安裝光碟完整進銷存系統範例，所有技術整合應用，高超技巧一覽無遺

書籍簡介: 本書特色　　『電腦軍師：易習 Access 2003 資料庫管理 含 SOEZ2u多媒體學園--突破Access 2003』為全國首創以Flash動畫為主的數位學習出版品，以平面搭配一片電腦互動光碟的形式出版，使用者還可享有SOEZ2u網站數位內容使用權，透過平面、電腦互動光碟與線上教學三大媒介的整合，不但可以滿足各種習慣的學習者，生動活潑的電腦課程呈現方式，讓學習效率更加提升。　　內容設計主體目標明確，在聽取操作說明後，立即透過實作過程進行驗證；讓每一次的學習因為目的單一而自然專注、因為單純而淺顯易懂，同時還具有“一次學習得到二次學習效果”的積極性學習成果。具備易學、易懂、易整合應用的特性，並讓整個學習過程豐富、滿足且有成就感。 　　教材以圖片，影片，動畫為主，文字說明搭配語音為輔，並加入Flash教學影片來做成多媒體的教材，讓整個課程生動有趣，操作介面簡單，每個課程結束後，搭配『互動練習』依照課程講解的說明實際帶領學習者一步步跟著操作，學習者可以藉由實際的動手操作完全瞭解電腦軟體的操作步驟，『互動練習』課程結束後搭配『互動測驗』，此時只提示相關應自行完成的動作，讓學習者自行測驗應該執行的操作步驟，如此經由『課程說明』教導操作步驟，『互動練習』帶領操作，『互動測驗』自行操作，立即達成學習的目的。　　Access與其他Office軟體一樣，擁有簡單易用的操作界面、方便實用的功能，只要配合書中功能的介紹解說，以及範例檔案的試作，學習Access的操控與應用，將不再是一件難事。想要學好Access嗎？我們將透過本書深入淺出的說明，讓您習得軟體的基本操控能力，更充分掌握Access的特性以及應用技巧，為您在資料庫這一條學習大路上，指引明確的方向，也越來越喜歡與Access為伍。

書籍簡介: 聽說，Microsoft Office 2003讓辦公室變聰明了。為什麼需要有Microsoft Office？為了因應未來劇烈變化又難以預測的網路世界，它已從個人產能產品套件跨足發展成更兼具全面性和整合性的系統。新版的Microsoft Office 2003包括伺服器、服務和桌面程式，在設計上相輔相乘，有助於商務用戶更容易存取商務資訊，強化組織預測、管理和掌握商場變化的能力、增加個人與團隊的工作效率，也可以改善個人產能、提升競爭力。在這個講究效率的資訊時代，如果不多學一門技術和撇步，恐怕很難有足夠的實力與人一較高下，結果就是被滾滾潮流淹沒而隨波逐流。你對Access夠瞭解嗎？其實它的功用大得很，雖然Access並不如Word、Excel容易操作使用，應用的觀念也迥異不同。但是對第一次接觸到資料庫的人而言，Access倒不失為一個相當容易上手的資料庫軟體。資料庫設計？近年來電腦科技的發展，帶動了企業e化的行動與口號，而資料庫就是這股e化風潮的最佳人選，如果能夠善用資料庫，迎接知識經濟時代對您而言根本易如反掌。事實上，資料庫在一般生活應用層面也相當廣泛，絕非八竿子打不著的表親，從簡單的通訊錄到複雜的會計報表，其實它都可以派上用場，這事兒如果不說明白，恐怕您就莫宰羊囉！Access與其他Office軟體一樣，擁有簡單易用的操作界面、方便實用的功能，只要配合書中功能的介紹解說，以及範例檔案的試作，學習Access的操控與應用，將不再是一件難事。想要學好Access嗎？我們將透過本書深入淺出的說明，讓您習得軟體的基本操控能力，更充分掌握Access的特性以及應用技巧，為您在資料庫這一條學習大路上，指引明確的方向，也越來越喜歡與Access為伍。

書籍簡介: 本書特色 　　本書以實例為導向，輔以基本觀念與原理說明，讓你在輕鬆完成作品時，也學會了Access的各種設計技巧與應用。  ■  本書共分為「基礎篇」與「實務篇」。在「基礎篇」中，以簡單的資料庫架構，讓你快速了解資料庫的基本運用：資料儲存與操作、使用者介面，資料輸出，以及常用的精靈與智慧標籤之應用。然後在「實務篇」中，深入探討資料庫規劃與各種物件之進階設計技巧，讓你能夠靈活運用各種物件來設計Access資料庫。  ■  在操作過程中，你可別錯過「小技巧」中的重點提示。而對於一般初學者常犯的錯誤，你可得特別留意「注意」中的說明。每章後面的「學習評量」可讓你加深記憶。透過舉一反三的實作題練習，加強你對Access資料庫的設計實力。Access 2003新增的「錯誤檢查選項」功能，則是以報表設計實務中的範例來作說明，可別錯過了哦！

Access Data Analysis Cookbook
書籍簡介: If you have large quantities of data in a Microsoft Access database, and need to study that data in depth, this book is a data cruncher's dream. Access Data Analysis Cookbook offers practical recipes to solve a variety of common problems that users have with extracting Access data and performing calculations on it. Each recipe includes a discussion on how and why the solution works.  Whether you use Access 2007 or an earlier version, this book will teach you new methods to query data, different ways to move data in and out of Access, how to calculate answers to financial and investment issues, and more. Learn how to apply statistics to summarize business information, how to jump beyond SQL by manipulating data with VBA, how to process dates and times, and even how to reach into the Excel data analysis toolkit. Recipes demonstrate ways to: Develop basic and sophisticated queries Apply aggregate functions, custom functions, regular expressions, and crosstabs Apply queries to perform non-passive activities such as inserting, updating, and deleting data Create and manipulate tables and queries programmatically Manage text-based data, including methods to isolate parts of a string and ways to work with numbers that are stored as text Use arrays, read and write to the Windows registry, encrypt data, and use transaction processing Use the FileSystemObject, use XML with XSLT, communicate with SQL Server, and exchange data with other Office products Find answers from time-based data, such as how to add time, count elapsed time, work with leap years, and how to manage time zones in your calculations Deal with business and finance problems, including methods for calculating depreciation, loan paybacks, and Return on Investment (ROI) Explore statistical techniques, such as frequency, variance, kurtosis, linear regression, combinations and permutations Access Data Analysis Cookbook is a one-stop-shop for extracting nuggets of valuable information from your database, and anyone with Access experience will benefit from these tips and techniques, including seasoned developers. If you want to use your data, and not just store it, you'll find this guide indispensable.

書名: Beginning Access 2007 VBA
Access 2007 徹底研究 -  入門應用、設計
書籍簡介: 1.以實做系統為整本書的主軸，直接學習如何建立資料庫，絕不拐彎抹角。2.完整呈現資料庫系統的分析、設計與實做的過程，一氣呵成。3.不空泛地講解Access各物件的操作方法，更強調操作技巧背後的原理。4.著重Access所有物件的架構觀念，並深入介紹各物件間的關係。5.不論是實做系統或者是各物件介紹，完全由淺而深循序漸進。6.以淺顯易懂的方式講解資料庫的正規化理論，不僅告訴您如何做？還告訴您為何要這樣做？7.每一個章節可以連貫操作，也可以利用操作範例直接切入任何一個主題。8.不止Step by Step，一步驟一插圖，每一步驟清清楚楚。9.每章均提供習題，加強讀者印象，並附詳細解答於書後。10. 徹底研究資料表、查詢…等基本Access物件，而對於較深入的運算式、SQL、事件、模組與VBA，絕不迴避。11.針對不會寫程式的讀者，特闢專章講解VBA基本語法。12.詳細剖析XML技術整合與樞紐分析表/圖的應用，酷炫功能決不遺漏。光碟內容 ：範例檔案

Microsoft Office Access 2007 VBA
書籍簡介: Business Solutions  Microsoft(R) Office Access 2007 VBA  Develop your Access 2007 VBA expertise instantly with proven techniques  Microsoft Office Access 2007 VBA builds on the skills you've already developed in creating database applications and helps you take them to the next level--using Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) to accomplish things you once performed manually. To facilitate this lofty goal, Access includes the VBA programming language. Even if you've never programmed, this book will help you learn how to leverage the power of VBA to make your work with Access more efficient than ever before. Microsoft Office Access 2007 VBA is for professionals who use Microsoft Access frequently in their daily work. You have serious work to get done and you can't spend all day reading a computer book. This book teaches you the essential skills you need to automate your databases as quickly as possible. Although written for Access 2007, the techniques and concepts covered will work in most versions of Microsoft Access.  Highlights of This Book Include  - Navigating within the Visual Basic Editor - Using variables, constants, and data types - Employing built-in functions - Creating procedures - Understanding object-and event-driven coding - Working with arrays - Understanding scope - Working with forms - Using selection controls - Creating reports - Exploring menus, navigation, and ribbons - Using object models - Working with data - Defining database schema - Using the Windows API - Working with XML files - Exploring Access SQL  On the Website  Download database files used in the book at www.quepublishing.com.  Category Office Applications Covers Visual Basic for Applications  User Level Intermediate - Advanced  Scott B. Diamond is a seasoned database designer and Microsoft Access 2007 MVP. During the last 20+ years, he has designed databases on a wide range of platforms, including dBASE, FoxPro, SQL/DS, Lotus Approach, Lotus Notes, and, for the past 10 years, Microsoft Access. Scott has worked as a consultant, both in-house and freelance, and as a support professional at firms that are among the leaders in their industries. Scott spends some of his free time answering questions at the premier site for Access support: http: //www.utteraccess.com.  Brent Spaulding started writing applications about 20 years ago and has utilized Microsoft Access since version 2.0. He looks forward to using Access well into the future. In July 2007, he received the Microsoft MVP award for Access, which recognizes his talent and contributions to the Access community.  Front cover bullets:   Edit and debug your code Use looping and conditional statements Understand the Access object- and event-driven architecture Automate data entry Learn how to use variables for dynamic automation Create user-friendly applications for others Create custom functions and objects Customize the user interface Manipulate data and objects with code

Access 2007 Forms &amp
書籍簡介: Do you have tons and tons of data on your computer but you're not quite sure how to make heads or tails of them--or even organize them? Are you using Access as spreadsheet rather than what it was really meant for? If you have trouble finding meaning in your data, then Access 2007 Forms & Reports for Dummies let you discover the wonders of this highly useful program. This no-nonsense guide gets right down to business by showing you the easy way to use this powerful tool. It gets you started with selective, targeted queries; forms that improve efficiency; and reports that communicate--while sparing you of any fancy language. This hands-on guide features clear, concise instructions that show you how to:   Orient yourself with forms and reports Create and modify queries Build and edit forms Design and update reports Troubleshoot queries, forms, and reports Make your forms useful Add multiple tables to forms Add finishing touches to reports  Thanks to the included references, Web sites, and informative tips, putting your data to good use has never been easier. You'll even add some pizzazz to your reports with handy suggestions on ways to wow your viewers. With Access 2007 Forms & Reports for Dummies,  you will be creating effective queries, forms, and reports in no time!

Access 2007 for Starters: The Missing Manual
書籍簡介: This fast-paced book teaches you the basics of Access 2007 so you can start using this popular database program right away. You'll learn how to work with Access' most useful features to design databases, maintain them, search for valuable nuggets of information, and build attractive forms for quick-and-easy data entry.  The new Access is radically different from previous versions, but with this book, you'll breeze through the new interface and its timesaving features in no time with:  Clear explanations Step-by-step instructions Lots of illustrations Larger type Plenty of friendly advice  Ideal for small businesses and households, Access runs on PCs and manages large stores information, including numbers, pages of text, and pictures -- everything from a list of family phone numbers to an enormous product catalog. Unfortunately, each new version of the program crammed in yet another set of features -- so many that even the pros don't know where to find them all. Access 2007 breaks the mold: Microsoft changed the user interface by designing a tabbed toolbar that makes features easy to locate. One thing that hasn't improved is Microsoft's documentation. Even if you find the features you need, you still may not know what to do with them. Access 2007 for Starters: The Missing Manual is the perfect primer for small businesses with no techie to turn to, as well as those who want to organize household and office information.

Access Hacks
書籍簡介: As part of the Microsoft Office suite, Access has become the industry's leading desktop database management program for organizing, accessing, and sharing information. But taking advantage of this product to build increasingly complex Access applications requires something more than your typical how-to book. What it calls for is Access Hacks from O'Reilly.This valuable guide provides direct, hands-on solutions that can help relieve the frustrations felt by users struggling to master the program's various complexities. For experienced users, Access Hacks offers a unique collection of proven techniques and tools that enable them to take their database skills and productivity to the next level. For Access beginners, it helps them acquire a firm grasp of the program's most productive features.A smart collection of insider tips and tricks, Access Hacks covers all of the program's finer points. Among the multitude of topics addressed, it shows users how to: work with Access in multi-user environmentsutilize SQL querieswork with external data and programsintegrate Access with third-party productsJust imagine: a learning process without the angst. Well, Access Hacks delivers it with ease, thanks to these down-and-dirty techniques not collected together anywhere else.Part of O'Reilly's best-selling Hacks series, Access Hacks is based on author Ken Bluttman's two decades of real-world experience in database programming and business application building. It's because of his vast experiences that the book is able to offer such a deep understanding of the program's expanding possibilities.

書籍簡介: 本書以最簡單的方式帶領您循序漸進的學習Access 2007，並以「KINGS進銷存管理系統」專案的實作來讓您驗證學習的成果。「KINGS進銷存管理系統」是一套標準的資料庫應用系統，藉由本專案的實作，讓您不僅知道如何利用Access 2007來管理資料，也知道如何利用它來設計出符合自己需求的應用系統。本書討論以下精彩主題  ◎  資料庫設計基本觀念  ◎  熟悉Access 2007內建各種資料庫物件的操作與應用  ◎  同步更新相關資料表記錄的技巧  ◎  KINGS進銷存管理系統專案實作　　只要您想利用Access 2007來解決資料管理上的問題，都能在本書有規劃的循序漸進之學習指引下，找到您專屬的解決方案。

書名: Computer Literacy for IC3, Unit 1 - Unit 3 / Myitlab Student Access Code Card for Office 2
iBook新手學Access 2007 中文版Soez2U
書籍簡介: DVD互動教學，輕鬆學習變成達人一遍輕鬆學、二遍趣味玩、三遍測驗通一本電腦書，讓你快速翻查隨意學入門基礎、綜合應用、隨手複習2007年全新改版，綜合動態教學、上機練習、互動練習、互動測驗、學習評量、學習成果的六大主題全方位學習。動態教學：由文書處理大師親自設計，影音同步播放，外加旁白與註解，看清楚、講明白，讓你學透透。上機練習：臨場感十足，開啟應用程式面對面操作。互動練習：使用引導式練習方式，清楚提示，讓你動手實作親身體驗。互動測驗：檢視自我成就，創造學習價值。學習評量：Smart情意式互動評量系統，自動挑錯給建議。學習成果：學習進度和成果一目了然，數位家教讓你帶回家。學習步調隨你意：自家電腦就是完整的e-learning學習教室。提供原始範例、素材檔案，同步學習零誤差。Access 2007全新的資料庫軟體設計應用教學共分成十三章，內容專注於全面提升讀者的實際操作能力，同時穿插講解必要的資料庫設計知識與觀念，使讀者可以真正達到即學即用的需求。本書從認識Access 2007用途與高效的全新視窗介面切入，逐步從應用面帶領讀者學會規劃資料庫並建立與應用資料表、查詢、表單、報表、事件、模組與巨集物件的方法與技巧，再擴大到與其他Office軟體整合應用的技巧，最終則透過一完整的資料庫設計實例，完美的將本書所學做了一個綜合性的設計應用總結。本書將帶您探索Access 2007最精華的內容！全方位認識軟體功能、概念、操作與視窗環境。掌握打造資料庫所必備的觀念與設計手法。資料表與關連式資料表建立、設計與應用。簡易、運算與動作查詢物件的設計與應用。建立、設計、美化表單物件與控制項應用設計。建立、設計、編輯、美化精美又專業的報表物件。事件、巨集與模組化的進階資料庫應用設計。Access在Office中的整合應用與資料庫分析技巧。實戰通訊錄資料庫綜合設計實例。

書名: Integrating Excel And Access
書籍簡介: In a corporate setting, the Microsoft Office Suite is an invaluable set of applications. One of Offices' biggest advantages is that its applications can work together to share information, produce reports, and so on. The problem is, there isn't much documentation on their cross-usage. Until now.  Introducing Integrating Excel and Access, the unique reference that shows you how to combine the strengths of Microsoft Excel with those of Microsoft Access. In particular, the book explains how the powerful analysis tools of Excel can work in concert with the structured storage and more powerful querying of Access. The results that these two applications can produce together are virtually impossible to achieve with one program separately.   But the book isn't just limited to Excel and Access. There's also a chapter on SQL Server, as well as one dedicated to integrating with other Microsoft Office applications. In no time, you'll discover how to: Utilize the built in features of Access and Excel to access data Use VBA within Access or Excel to access data Build connection strings using ADO and DAO Automate Excel reports including formatting, functions, and page setup Write complex functions and queries with VBA Write simple and advanced queries with the Access GUI Produce pivot tables and charts with your data With Integrating Excel and Access, you can crunch and visualize data like never before. It's the ideal guide for anyone who uses Microsoft Office to handle data.

書名: Concepts of Calculus with Applications + MyMathLab Access Code + Video Lectures
Access Cookbook
快快樂樂學Access 2007徹底活用(附光碟)
書籍簡介: 本書秉持「快快樂樂」系列叢書一貫之特色-深入淺出、平易近人，帶領您一起感受 Access 2007 在資料庫建置、使用與管理上的超強魅力。本書依據作者群多年來的實務與教學經驗撰寫而成，全文使用範例導向的編輯方式，讓讀者在沒有壓力的狀態下，輕鬆進入 Access 2007 的應用境界。本書特色　　資料庫的學習已經是目前生活及職場上相當重要的功課，善用收集的資料進行查詢、管理及分析是企業中相當重要的工作。Access 是微軟中應用資料庫相當重要的軟體，在學習之前，本書將針對於資料資料庫的結構與資料表等物件的特性進行詳細的說明，進而引導讀者建立一個全新的資料庫檔案。　　資料庫會隨著記錄的累積而與日俱增，善用尋找、取代、排序、篩選，或者是功能更強大的查詢，再搭配關聯式資料庫的運用，更可以讓使用者在瀏覽資料時能隨查隨得，無往不利。　　表單可針對某一個資料表或查詢產生特定的操作介面，更可依照喜好讓介面更有個性，讓使用者在輸入資料時不但方便，更可提高工作效率。　　報表是組織及呈現 Access 資料庫資料的最好方式，在製作時可以套用資料表或查詢物件，以供列印或顯示在畫面上進行檢視。除此外，報表還可以運用資料庫內容製作出標籤與明信片。　　巨集與VBA程式設計可以創造專業又便捷的指令按鈕與程式功能，讓資料庫發揮百分之一百二十的功力。善用巨集即可讓一般使用者在很短的時間內開發出實用有效的程式，但當遇到在 Access 中並沒有內建的功能，或是操作結合多個不同功能的工作時，就必須依靠VBA程式設計來達成。　　Access 與其他軟體之間的資料交換與整合，能將不同類別、來源的資料內容統合在 Aceess 資料庫中，除了互通有無，還能整合分析出更有用的資料。最後將分享一些 Access 操作密技、實用方法，更有效率的完成工作。　　相信只要活用並了解本書的範例與內容，必能為您的生活與職場帶來更多助益。作者服務網址 / E-mail :www.e-happy.com.twserivce@e-happy.com.tw

書籍簡介: 資訊爆炸，如何管理？簡單易學的Access 2007將輕易滿足大眾的個性化需要；本書透過大量實例從“知識應用”與“動手能力”兩方面配套切入教學，搭配書中範例與圖解步驟同步進行，達到易學、易懂、深刻理解的目的，收到事半功倍的學習效果。學習進程佳－章節編排由淺入深三階段學習－入門應用複習全到位拼圖式養成─自選獨立、連貫整合式的學習主題圖解式教學－按圖索驥學有所成內容夠全面－基本功能各樣技巧一次給足重點式條列－功能操作學習目標不遺漏本書特色全方位認識軟體功能、概念、操作與視窗環境。掌握打造資料庫所必備的觀念與設計手法。資料表與關連式資料表建立、設計與應用。簡易、運算與動作查詢物件的設計與應用。建立、設計、美化表單物件與控制項應用設計。建立、設計、編輯、美化精美又專業的報表物件。事件、巨集與模組化的進階資料庫應用設計。Access在Office中的整合應用與資料庫分析技巧。實戰通訊錄資料庫綜合設計實例。

書名: Macroscale & Microscale Organic Experiments Access Code

資料庫系統理論-使用Access
書籍簡介: 電腦發展至今，資訊種類愈來愈複雜，人們對電腦的依賴也愈來愈重，各種應用軟體從簡單功能使用擴展到各種軟體支援應用，功能愈來愈強，操作也愈來愈複雜。資料庫也是一樣，從早期集中式資料庫發現到現在的分散式資料庫，使得資料庫應用範圍非常廣泛，幾乎與我們日常生活息息相關，密不可分。舉凡郵局銀行取／存款、火車訂票、醫院掛號門診、企業機關學校人事系統、學生成績登錄系統、學生選課系統、學生註冊繳費系統、企業間電子商務…等等，可見資料庫多麼重要！書內容共有十四章，內容以資料庫理論與實做並重，資料庫實做以Office套裝軟體中的Access 2007為主，本書實做內容以較進階方式介紹，內容敘述力求簡潔易懂，排版也儘量章節分明，能使您閱讀會有舒適的感覺，是值得您慢慢去品嚐的一本有關資料庫書籍。

書名: Access Forms & Reports for Dummies
書籍簡介: Create queries that make forms and reports useful  Develop forms to access the data you need and make reports that make sense!  If you thought you had to use a spreadsheet program to produce reports and forms, guess what! Access can turn out great-looking forms and reports that actually show what's going on with your data -- if you know how to ask it nicely. This hands-on guide helps you do just that, and it works with all versions of Access.  Discover how to * Ask Access the right questions * Work with sets of data * Create simple forms with a wizard * Use queries to create new tables * Troubleshoot queries * Add visual features to reports

書籍簡介: 1.詳細的介紹MCAS考試制度、考場資訊以及考試應注意事項。2.詳盡的MCAS認證模擬試題，可協助考生輕鬆的做好考試的準備。3.只需花費極短的時間，便能迅速掌握Access 2007 精髓。4.完整的資料庫概念導引，清楚介紹操作Access資料庫的技巧。5.多數題目均有操作小密訣，能讓您對每一項操作功能，有著更進一步的認識。6.熟讀本書，反覆練習，準備MCAS認證考試，一次OK。本書適合人士：1、想要通過MCAS- Access 2007全球認證考試者。2、想要加強Access資料庫基本觀念者3、想要掌握資料庫處理技巧，提昇工作效率者本書特色1.完整清晰的MCAS模擬試題詳解，熟讀本書，反覆演練模擬試題，準備考試信心加倍。2.提供讀者正確的Access 2007 使用概念。3.不論面對MCAS認證考試，或者將來進入職場，明確的指出Access應該特別加強的使用技巧。4.本書是以「職場的實用性」為切入點，由淺入深。除了能夠在很短的時間之內，讓您瞭解Access 2007的精華所在，以及各種操作觀念和技巧之外，更重要的是，熟讀本書，必能帶您通過MCAS認證考試。5.由Microsoft MVP(Office system)親自撰寫，充份掌握試題動向與實務需求。

書名: Ace Student Access Code Card
資料庫管理理論與實務－Access 2007(第二
書籍簡介: 在我們日常生活中，須要處理大量的資料。Access即是一套快速上手、簡單易學的資料庫軟體；話說如此，但是對於資料庫的相關理論，我們依然必須了解，所以本書會精闢介紹資料庫相關理論的入門知識。在Access2007的功能方面，除了基本的資料庫物件如資料表、查詢、表單、報表，會逐一介紹。另外對於事件、巨集、模組，其相關應用亦會涵蓋於本書的範圍。在資料庫的相關理論，透過關聯式資料庫的觀點來探討資料庫正規化的技術，及使用資料模型，最後以一個實作的資料庫來展現Access2007的應用。CD內含:內文各章範例檔案

書名: Basic Mathematics Through Applications + Mymathlab Student Access Kit
Microsoft Office Access 2007 Forms, Reports, and Queries
書籍簡介: Microsoft Access is a large, intimidating program. Unlike Word or Excel where users can perform basic tasks without much in the way of training, Access presents challenges from the outset. Most users never progress beyond creating simple tables and using Wizards to create basic forms and reports. At the same time, all users - from managers to researchers to administrative assistants - need to know that what they seek is embedded somewhere in their Access tables. Without a more sophisticated knowledge of how to extract and present that data, they are forced to rely on office gurus and overworked IT people to provide canned reports or one-size-fits-all solutions. This book will change all that by giving readers the skills required to extract the data they need (queries), build efficient front-ends for that data (forms), and publish the results in an attractive and easy-to-read format (reports). To that end, this book shuns the big Access picture and instead focuses intently on queries, forms, and reports. This in-depth approach will give the reader the skills and understanding he or she needs to get at the data and prove the old adage that knowledge is indeed power.

書名: 精彩Access 2007中文版
書籍簡介: Access是美國微軟公司發展多年的資料庫管理系統軟體，最新版的Access 2007除了操作介面的大幅度改變以外，還提供版面配置檢視、自動月曆、附件資料類型、允許多重值……等新功能，使得Access在分析和管理資料的應用上更加方便，也更加迅速。本書內容包括Access 2007新增功能介紹、資料表的建立與設計、資料的輸入、排序與篩選、設定資料關聯、查詢的建立與設計、表單的建立與設計、表單的進階設計技巧、報表的建立與設計、與其他軟體的整合和安全設定、巨集與事件的應用、VBA程式設計等。更重要的是，於附書光碟中收錄作者所設計的收支、股票、會計、庫存四個資料庫管理系統範例和說明文件，希望讓讀者能更充分掌握資料庫系統設計的要訣。

書籍簡介: 「Access 2007是目前最廣泛使用的桌上型資料庫系統， 甚至不用撰寫任何程式碼， 就可以輕鬆建立使用者所需的資料庫系統。」「本書說明如何使用Access 2007來規劃、分析和建立資料庫系統，從基礎的資料庫理論 開始，詳細說明Access的關聯式資料庫」■從資料庫基礎理論出發：針對初學者學習資料庫系統理論所設計的內容，詳細說明資料庫系統的各種資料庫模型、主從架構資料庫系統、ANSI-SPARC三層資料庫系統架構、資料庫綱要和資料庫管理師負責的工作。■建立關聯式資料庫：詳細說明關聯式資料庫模型、實體關聯圖的建立和如何執行正規化分析，使用完整系所小型【選課系統】分析實例，來說明關聯式資料庫的觀念與實作。■資料庫系統的開發：使用進銷存系統的【銷售管理系統】子系統為例，完整從系統分析，並且在過程中導入系統建立的重要技巧，這是完整的系統開發實例，可以讓讀者驗證所學與關聯式資料庫分析。

書籍簡介: 本書特色　 它是針對沒時間去探討一套軟體的人而寫的。書不在厚，夠用就好，所以它並不詳述該軟體的所有功能，而針對較常用的部份以圖文循序的方式列出步驟並詳加解說，甚至在您遇到問題時再隨手翻翻即可！ *由資料庫範例來認識資料庫系統 *認識資料庫的各類物件 *資料表的建立與資料的維護 *何謂關聯式資料庫，如何建立資料表之間的關聯 *如何製作各式表單並以表單來維護資料 *各式報表的製作及列印 *切換表單的製作 *為資料庫系統加密 附書光碟內容 各章節範例檔練習檔與成果檔

作者: 中華民國電腦技能基金會
書籍簡介: ▓題庫設計均以實務應用為導向，品質及認證公信力最具權威！▓囊括Access2007最常用之功能，學、術科題庫，題目淺顯易懂，豐富且多樣化，讓讀者能夠循序漸進的學習，熟練Access軟體的基本操作。▓精選學科題庫8大類共288題，採電腦線上(On-Line)作答，學習效果立即呈現。可透過題庫練習系統依類別組題目進行練習。▓精選術科題庫4大類共40題，包含「資料表建構與資料建置」、「查詢類型及設計」、「表單控制項之建立與應用」、「報表設計與控制項運用」等類別，依教學進度可指定學生任選單題練習，有效掌握教學效果，透過題庫電腦自動評分系統，可立即評核學習成果。▓本書題庫適用在Microsoft Access 2007之軟體上執行。▓配合電腦技能基金會(http://www.csf.org.tw) 測驗流程，一舉取得專業證照。

書籍簡介: ‧實務 範例 ＋ 流程 構思 ＋介面 引導＝ 正確 的查詢結果‧150 個日常工作上最常需要的查詢帶您有效突破查詢障礙！‧一本可以隨時翻閱查詢的工具書，立即解決Access 查詢問題！本書特色本書除了有非常多實務應用的查詢範例，作者更以多年實戰經驗傳授重要的製作步驟與各項技巧；期望藉由這樣的方式，培養大家都能成為玩弄資料的高手。此外，子查詢常常讓一般的使用者望而卻步。其實只要充分運用Access 2007的查詢介面，您不寫程式也能快速建立出內含子查詢的查詢。‧背了一堆SQL語法，卻還是寫不出查詢嗎？別忘了善用Access的交談式查詢介面，寫起查詢來，就好像說話一樣，隨著交談的進行，結果也就逐步產生，完全不需撰寫任何程式。‧自信滿滿寫出的查詢，結果資料是錯誤的嗎？查詢的學習，應重視構思的過程與思維，才能豁然開朗，舉一反三，跟著本書完整的查詢範例多加練習！必能成為玩弄資料的高手。‧每次寫查詢，就深感挫折，想砸了電腦嗎？學習重方法，查詢重過程，本書整理出150個日常工作上最常需要的查詢，十足的範例引導，而不是僵化的強記，讓您戰勝自我，讓老闆刮目相看，重拾自信。 光碟內容‧本書範例檔案

書名: Calculus With Applications + Mymathlab/Mystatlab Student Access Kit + Student’s Solutions
速學！Access 2007(附完整範例檔光碟)
書籍簡介: 輕鬆入門：課程規劃由淺入深，初學者也能輕鬆上手，迅速學會範例導向：內容以實例操作引導學習，教學、自修兩相宜熟練實作：書附範例光碟，讓您依照需求馬上套用自我評量：豐富的課後習題，讓您自我測試學習成果建立與管理Access資料庫：告訴您如何建立一個全新的資料庫，可以從空白的資料庫開始作業，或者透過Access資料庫精靈的引導，一步一步地建立新資料庫。建立資料關聯：資料庫之所以能夠設計出多樣化的表單和報表物件，最大的關鍵在於資料表之間可以建立關聯。活用關聯式資料庫、編修資料庫關聯圖、產生關聯圖報表、應用子資料工作表…等，讓您在作業與管理上更有效率！設計與建立查詢：『查詢』在資料庫中的使用是相當廣泛，更是關聯式資料庫的靈魂。我們將說明如何依據『關聯資料表』建立各式查詢。設計與建立表單：Access所提供的表單資料庫物件，是用來建立使用者介面最好的幫手，它採用『所見即所得』的方式，利用表單資料的編輯、篩選與排序、樞紐分析表與分析圖、建立控制項…等，讓你在轉眼間建立各式精美的表單。與Office2007其他軟體整合：Microsoft Office 2007中的各項應用軟體擁有相似的操作介面，彼此之間可以充分整合。透過『插入物件框』的技巧或使用Access內建的指令與功能，直接與Word、Excel或Outlook進行整合、分析。

書名: A Survey of Mathematics With Applications + Mymathlab/Mystatlab Student Access Kit + Stude
Microsoft Office Access 2003
Access Vba Programming for Dummies
書籍簡介: This friendly, easy-to-use guide shows experienced Access users how to use VBA (Visual Basic for Applications) to build Access databases and applications, but also covers programming fundamentals for nonprogrammers Includes practical, ready-to-use VBA code examples that readers can type or copy and paste from the Web into their own database projects Explains basic VBA skills and concepts for nonprogrammers, such as procedures, variables, and loops Covers more advanced topics, such as record sets and other programming activities that are unique to Access programming Author has written more than ninety computer books and has been working with databases since the early 1980s

書名: 最新Access VBA活用範例大辭典
書籍簡介: ●最完整收錄555項Access VBA的活用技巧 ●最良善的編排方式，讓您可以快速查詢 ●最完備的範例解說，充份了解範例執行步驟與結果 ●最清楚的視窗提供，加強使用VBA時的概念 ●標示初、中、高級，容易掌握難易程度 ●隨附光碟收錄全書完整的範例程式，是您最佳的範例佐證 本書分12個章節，共收錄555項Access VBA的活用技巧。除了基本技巧外，還包括可以靈活運用在業務工作上的高級技巧，特別推薦給想要開發VBA來運用資料庫的讀者們。本書除了針對程式碼做詳細的解說外，也會為您說明為何使用及該程式碼的基本意義。這本活用範例大辭典絕對能成為面對Access VBA時最好的技術手冊。 本書完全支援Access 2000/2002/2003。

書名: Calculus With Applications / Mathxl 12-Month Student Access Kit / Calculus With Applicatio
Beginning Algebra + Math Study Skills + Mymathlab/Mystatlab Student Access Kit
Intermediate Algebra + Math Study Skills + Mymathlab/Mystatlab Student Access Kit
快快樂樂學Access 2003徹底活用(附光碟)
書籍簡介: 本書維持「快快樂樂」系列叢書一貫之特色-深入淺出、平易近人，帶領您一起感受 Access 2003 的超強魅力。只要透過本書的內容，舉凡資料庫各式物件：資料表、查詢、表單、報表、資料頁、巨集與VBA模組等都可快樂學習、快樂應用，全文使用實例導向的編輯方式保證讓您在無壓力的狀態下，輕鬆上手學會 Access 2003。本書特點第一章?第三章Access 是微軟開發的一種資料庫軟體，學習之前，先認識資料庫的結構與資料表物件的特性，進而自己建立一個全新的資料庫檔案。第四章?第六章資料庫會隨著記錄的累積而與日俱增，如果臨時要找其中一筆記錄將會費時曠日；因此善用尋找、取代、排序、篩選，或者是功能更強大的查詢，再搭配關聯式資料庫的運用，更可以讓你隨查隨得，無往不利。第七章?第八章資料表的列印、輸出，需要表單或是報表的協助，還可以製作出：單欄式、表格式、圖表式、樞紐分析圖(表)、明信片與信封標籤。第九章?第十一章資料頁可以讓資料庫網頁化，巨集與VBA模組可以設計專業又便捷的指令按鈕與程式動作，讓資料庫操作更加得心應手。第十二章?第十三章介紹 Access 與其他 Office 軟體之間的資料交換方式，以便互通有無。還要爆料一些 Access 操作密技，讓您達到完美之境。相信只要活用本書的範例，必能為您的生活與職場帶來更多助益。

書名: Finite Mathematics + Mymathlab/Mystatlab Student Access Kit + Graphing Calculator and Exce
ACCESS 2007 VBA應用(附完整範例檔光碟)
書籍簡介: Access VBA應用一點通！認識Access VBA的基本設計概念、物件導向、事件驅動、程式流程…等重要觀念，並援引多個實例，從簡單的VBA程式看資料庫系統，使讀者從中學習更多VBA精髓！VBA主要能用來設計許多Windows的應用程式，運用一些簡單的VBA，即能解決許多繁瑣的事情！期望透過本書，能讓想學Access VBA或不敢碰觸的使用者，都能學會使用！並且將其靈活應用，實實在在地解決歷年來惱人的資料庫管理工作。閱讀本書之前，建議您仍然要將Access的基本操作與重要功能做完整的了解。學習程式不難，重要的是學習的著眼點與步驟，本書是以Access各項物件為重點以範例導引操作來說明，您可以清楚Access VBA對應的處理步驟，有效率的抓住學習重點！．完整介紹Access VBA的基本設計概念、物件導向和事件驅動的重要觀念、程式的流程和程序等觀念。．全書盡量以『進出貨管理系統』為範例，說明如何規劃資料庫、資料表之間的連結，以及如何設計系統所需的表單或報表。．針對一般使用習慣，我們將說明如何設計整個資料庫應用系統的切換表單。．本書特別說明如何自訂全新功能區索引標籤、功能區群組與其對應的命令。．以專章說明，將自己設計的資料庫系統，加以封裝並於客戶端電腦上安裝使用。即便客戶端沒有安裝Access 2007軟體，仍然可以照常使用。．搭配實例說明，從簡單的VBA程式，看資料庫系統，使讀者從中學習到更多VBA的精髓。光碟內容：本書範例（適用於2007 、2003、2002）

書名: 資料庫理論與實務：Access 2007(附光碟)
書籍簡介: 這是一本專為資料庫課程所設計的教科書，結合資料庫理論與實務，在理論部份說明資料庫原理、關聯式資料庫以及正規化的分析，而實務部份則以Access為重點，將理論引導至實務，透過圖、表讓學生學習建立資料庫的完整知識。全書共分五篇，分別為資料庫概論、建立關聯式資料庫、操作介面的設計、整合應用及強化資料庫。1.教學角度切入：從教學時數建議、課前準備、學習目標、內文+圖表+範例、學習回顧，再到最後的學習評量，完全以教學的角度來編寫本書。2.範例設計導向：讓學生從小範例逐一學習，進而到可以建構整個系統，範例多數提供了練習檔及完成檔，並配合章末的學習評量，讓學生從反覆練習到精熟。

書名: Access 2007實例演練關鍵技
書籍簡介: Microsoft Office Access 2007最關鍵活用技法，最實用的實戰教學資料庫設計．報表建立．Word/Excel/Outlook 2007整合運用輕鬆熟通不論是在政府部門或私人企業的資訊管理過程中，隨著事務的拓展，資訊工作人員所面臨的情況將是愈來愈龐大的資料量，接踵而來的是儲存、應用等問題，必須藉由使用資料庫的優點，才能達到方便又有效率的工作需求。Microsoft Office Access 2007的全新使用者介面，增強了資料庫安全性、讓資料庫更密實、資料修復更可靠，不但簡化了功能操作的方式，並且能更快地製作出所需的系統。本書從認識Access資料庫開始，逐步導入建立以銷售作業為主題的資料庫。在每篇章中，會以文字搭配畫面的方式說明範例，並提供練習範例及完成的結果檔案，分別存放於「練習範例」及「完成範例」資料夾內，讓你可在實機練習完成後對照比較，相信能收到「好消化；益吸收」的學習效果。

書名: Mathematical Ideas / MyMathLab / MyStatLab Student Access Code
跟我學-ACCESS 2007數位學習系統(附光碟)
書籍簡介: 教學時數總長467分鐘“跟我學” 是由專業講師團隊所編輯錄製的數位學習系統，作者以自身累積十五年的教學經驗，透過精心規劃的編排章節及詳細的語音操作說明，再搭配獨家技術製作的字幕，提供給您最直接、最有效的學習方式；不必花大錢，在家就能跟著大師學習。本書特色》主題式學習．一學就會:　清楚的課程章節規劃，讓使用者可隨時點選需要的課程學習，自行安排學習進度。》步驟式教學．一看就懂：　透過清楚的步驟式教學，只要跟著步驟操作，讓您也能輕鬆完成範例效果。》專業級講師．一聽就通：　參與 "跟我學數位學習系統" 的講師都是具有多年實際教學經驗的老師，將自身經驗完整傳授給學員，使用者不必去外上課也能在家學習。》評量式測驗．一試就知：　為了讓使用者能了解學習進度，每章學習後皆有測驗題目，一試便知。

書名: Applied Basic Mathematics Plus Mymathlab Student Access Kit
私房教師Access 2007數位學習系統
書籍簡介: ● 什麼是『私房教師』數位學習系統？‧93學年度國科會數位教學研究計畫指定教材‧2003年『PC Office雜誌』週年慶指定贈品‧2003年『Smart智富月刊』週年慶指定贈品‧同系列產品獲法務部、中科院、慈濟大學等數十家公民營企業及教育單位指定為訓練教材‧2002年資訊月Microsoft指定贈品‧全台灣超過10萬人正在使用『私房教師數位學習系統』1.『私房教師』數位學習系統是由微軟資深講師親自策劃，累積數十年教學經驗，充分結合軟體功能與使用者學習習慣，讓教學與學習同時發揮最大的效果2.影音教學方式，生動活潑，操作過程一目了然，彷彿有電腦老師親自教授3.採用最新影音技術製作，無論是在影像、音質、畫面流暢上都保持最佳狀態4.主題式教學，可依個人進度選取特定主題學習，並可透過搜尋功能找到相關主題參考，節省時間，學習更完整5.提供範例檔案，可同步做練習，不需要自行設計範例，省時有效6.豐富的內容，巨細靡遺，絕對可以輕鬆上手，無往不利

書籍簡介: 本書是為欲報考MOS Access Core 2003的學習者及教學者所設計。內容涵蓋:認識MOS認證、觀念引導教學篇、模擬試題篇及考前準備與注意事項提醒篇。本書特色在基礎概念篇，作者會先介紹Access的基礎概念，再以近兩年最常出現的題型當範例，詳細解說做法，並連結至相對應的模擬試題，讓讀者在練習模擬試題時若遇瓶頸或困惑，可對照此部份的說明尋求解答。而使用本教材授課的教師亦可先講解基礎概念篇再讓學生練習模擬試題，如此可收事半功倍之效。而在模擬試題篇，係整理最近的考題讓讀者練習，書中會有正確操作步驟介紹，內附光碟也會提供模擬試題之操作示範。每個模擬試題都能連結至基礎概念篇的相關範例，以使讀者建立更紮實的資料庫概念。光碟內容1、本書範例檔2、模擬試題所需要資料檔3、模擬試題操作示範檔4、Access Core 2003模擬認證系統

書名: Calculus and Its Applications + Mymathlab/Mystatlab Student Access Kit + Student’s Solutio
Access 2003 for Starters: The Missing Manual
書籍簡介: Maybe you got Access as part of Microsoft Office and wonder what it can do for you and your household; maybe you're a small business manager and don't have a techie on staff to train the office in Microsoft Access. Regardless, you want to quickly get your feet wet--but not get in over your head--and Access 2003 for Starters: The Missing Manual is the book to make it happen.Far more than a skimpy introduction but much less daunting than a weighty tech book, Access 2003 for Starters: The Missing Manual demystifies databases and explains how to design and create them with ease. It delivers everything you need--and nothing you don't--to use Access right away. It's your expert guide to the Access features that are most vital and most useful, and it's your trusted advisor on the more in-depth features that are best saved for developers and programmers.Access is sophisticated and powerful enough for professional developers but easy and practical enough for everyday users like you. This Missing Manual explains all the major features of Access 2003, including designing and creating databases, organizing and filtering information, and generating effective forms and reports.Bestselling authors, database designers, and programmers Scott Palmer, Ph.D., and Kate Chase are your guides for putting the world's most popular desktop data management program to work. Their clear explanations, step-by-step instructions, plenty of illustrations, and timesaving advice help you get up to speed quickly and painlessly.Whether you're just starting out or you know you've been avoiding aspects of the program and missing out on much of what it can do, this friendly, witty book will gently immerse you in Microsoft Access. Keep it handy, as you'll undoubtedly refer to it again and again.

書名: Mathematical Ideas / Mathxl 12-Month Student Access
舞動Access 2003中文版
Inside Relational Databases With Examples in Access
書籍簡介: Contents Should we tell you the whole story? Of course, there is an inevitable tension in trying to work like this. For example, in Chapter 16 we talk about referential integrity. There are - sentially six different flavors of referential integrity but Access only s- ports four of them (they are the most important ones however, so you aren't missing out on too much). The problem is this. Should we tell you about the other two? If we do, as an Access user you have every right to be annoyed that we are telling you about a feature you can't use. On the other hand, the six different types that we describe are part of the re- tional world and this book is about that world - we are not trying to teach you how to use Access, we are simply using Access to illustrate the relational model. Ultimately we decided to risk your ire and to describe all of the features of the relational model as we see it, even if Access doesn't support all of them. One advantage of this approach is that if you need to use a different database engine you will almost certainly find the extra information useful. Incidentally, this is not meant to imply that Access is somehow lacking as a relational database engine. The reason we chose it for the first book is that it is such a good example of a relational database tool.

書籍簡介: 這本書的目標是針對Access與Dreamweaver的使用者、提供一套整合應用的方法，讓網路資料庫的設計或維護更靈活、更具效率、也更切合實際的需求。撰寫的方式則以精簡、實用當做主要目標，所以沒有冗長的文字敘述或煩雜的步驟流程。書中並提供書籍展示查詢、會員管理、電子報、線上新聞、留言版、線上討論區等六組具有實用性的範例系統，並附上詳細的規化流程以及操作說明，可經由實作的過程澈底掌握網路資料庫的實務經驗。 用實作的方式介紹Access的資料庫管理功能，可讓不曾接觸過Access或資料庫軟體的讀者，輕易上手並有效地管理資料庫。 詳細介紹Excel與Access的資料結構以及轉換的方法，並說明如何針對個別的需求，快速地套用對應的功能，讓Excel與Access緊密地結合並互相支援。 依據版本最新的Dreamweaver 8說明網頁應用程式的設計方法，並針對新增的功能提供詳細的解說與範例，可讓讀者快速地開發網路資料庫系統。 提供書籍展示查詢、會員管理、電子報、線上新聞、留言版、線上討論區等六組具有實用性的範例系統，並附上詳細的規化流程以及操作說明，可經由實作的過程澈底掌握網路資料庫的實務經驗。

書名: 資料庫網站系統應用-使用Access Java
書籍簡介: 一般來言，將資料庫推向網路應用，最有效最普遍的方式是借助ASP。為了更具挑戰性，本書使用Java2。 目前資料庫的研發結果，可謂完整又方便，不僅僅是一個儲存資料的場所，且可執行篩選、排序、關聯、運算、甚至複雜的邏輯問題，有人說：『祗要您說得出，資料庫就可做得到』，雖然有點誇張，但筆者認為亦不遠矣。在眾多資料庫中，Access應屬最方便且功能不輸其他者，凡有Office的電腦，開機即可使用，無需再架server，無需另添購軟體，本書以其為範例資料庫。 通常架網站，我們都使用Window系統內建之IIS，而本書則使用servlet — jdsk2.1，是另一類Java網站架設系統，可令讀者眼界更寬更廣，更具挑戰，更有潛力。 當讀者閒逛書店，看到一本合味口的電腦書，內容精彩得不忍釋手，但還是卻步不買，原因非他，僅祗是不知使用何種軟體，或是搭配的軟價格太貴。有關Java2使用的軟體，均可於 “http://java.sun.com” 免費下載取得，本書自亦不例外。讀者可自行下載、或使用本書光碟C:\BookJavaAccess \System已備之系列軟體。 Java為物件導向程式語言，邏輯架構完整，功能強大，發展至今已成為佔有率最高，使用率最廣的程式語言。亦即凡研習電腦者不可不會的語言，唯門檻較高，令許多人望而卻步。若搭配筆者著：(1) Java2網路系統程式—松崗XP5117，(2) Java2網路3D繪圖程式設計—松崗XP5257，及本書(3) 資料庫網站系統應用。此三本書涵及網路、系統、3D繪圖、資料庫等各層面之Java應用，讀者可輕鬆切入，對Java作全面性有系統之認識。此外、本書對下列各點亦可提供有意義的協助。 1、您的工作、是每天坐在電腦前、輸入或印出公司的各類資料嗎？ 當系統功能不敷使用，您急著找原設計廠商，但不是找不到、就是要昂貴費用時！您可閱讀本書，迅速自己設計一個臨時系統，解決應急之問題。 2、您有閒暇逸緻、想輕鬆賺點外快嗎？ 您可閱讀本書，在短時間內，即可向商店、補習班、幼稚園、診所、餐廳、大樓管理等小型機構，包攬一些小型行政軟體。 3、您是老板、或是部門主管嗎？ 您閱讀本書後，當有廠商競標您公司行政系統電腦化軟體時！您將很清楚的了解底價在那裡，應設計有那些功能。 當員工提出要求或問題時！您將輕昜的了解他們的問題，並說出解決的方法。 4、您是高職、專科、大學的學生嗎？ 老師迫著您繳作業、繳專題，您不知如何是好時！您可研讀本書，不僅可幫助增進您的學業，也可幫您解決成績的問題。 5、您想自修更上一層樓嗎？ 當您閱讀本書後，包括生手在內、您對電腦應用之能力、都將大大的跨前一步。若再佐以上述筆者推薦之各書，更是不可限量，更具挑戰性。

書籍簡介: 本書使用大家都很熟悉的學校課程選修、成績計算、學分計算、成績查詢為主軸 (避開了商店、書店的管銷程序) 建立了一個ACCESS的資料庫；而且資料庫的建立是由「零」開始從無到有，讓你漸入佳境，由簡入繁 (避開了在學習的初期就讓你看一大堆的表單、資料表…)，並且讓你在不覺得困難的情況下已經進入了ACCESS VBA的程式操作，也相當程度的瞭解了ADODB、ADOX函式庫的運作，最後也有完全程式的系統封裝。即使在VBA程式的練習寫作中，也盡量避免大型程式的架構，所有的有效程式都是由小而大，逐步的偵錯、修改、演化、進階而來。 是故使你在學習VBA的過程中你一定會有收獲、有成就、有創意。

書名: Prealgebra
書籍簡介: Prealgebra by Trigsted, Gallaher, and Bodden is the first online, completely "clickable" prealgebra text to take full advantage of MyMathLab's features and benefits. Kirk Trigsted saw marked improvements in student learning when he started teaching with MyMathLab, but he noticed that most students started their assignments by going directly to the MyMathLab homework exercises without consulting their textbook. This inspired Kirk to write a true eText, built within MyMathLab, to create a dynamic, seamless learning experience that would better meet the needs and expectations of his students. Completely clickable and fully integrated-the Trigsted eText is designed for today's learners.  KEY TOPICS:  Whole Numbers; Integers and Introduction to Solving Equations; Solving Equations and Problem Solving; Fractions and Mixed Numbers; Decimals; Ratio, Proportion, and Triangle Applications; Percent; Graphing and Introduction to Statistics; Geometry and Measurement; Exponents and Polynomials; Tables; Quotient Rule and Negative Exponents; Scientific Notation; Geometric Formulas MARKET:  For all readers interested in prealgebra.

書名: PHP 5 + Access 2003網際商務系統設計經典
Access 2003 VBA私房教師
書籍簡介: 感謝讀者們對於金禾資訊私房教師兩大學習利器～私房書與數位學習系統，熱情的支持與鼓勵，讓我們的Office私房書系列甫上市便立即打進各大門市銷售排行，佳評如潮，而數位學習教學光碟則與線上購物網站的結合，創造出令人驚豔的亮麗成績。　　金禾資訊為回饋廣大讀者群的需求，特別推出1000套私房教師組合包裝，將這兩項學習的利器結合在一起，讓您一次滿足所有的學習慾望，各大門市均有販售，但因數量有限預購從速歐。　　『私房書』介紹：　　本書採用全新的版面設計及全圖示化模式編寫，加上流暢的文字敘述，條理分明的步驟解說，讓讀者於潛移默化中輕鬆打好紮實基礎，不論學校考試、就業面試，全都用得到，且全系列書採用全彩印刷，絕對能讓讀者在閱讀上更加輕鬆，這樣擁有學習最有效、閱讀最輕鬆、價格最優惠的好書，您千萬別錯過了。　　『私房教師』數位學習系統介紹：　　‧93學年度國科會數位教學研究計畫指定教材　　‧2003年『PC Office雜誌』『Smart智富月刊』週年慶指定贈品　　‧同系列產品獲法務部、中科院、慈濟大學等數十家公民營企業及教育單位指定為訓練教材　　‧2002年資訊月Microsoft指定贈品　　‧全台灣超過10萬人正在使用『私房教師數位學習系統』　　1.『私房教師』數位學習系統是由微軟資深講師江高舉老師親自策劃，累積數十年教學經驗，充分結合軟體功能與使用者學習習慣，讓教學與學習同時發揮最大的效果　　2.影音教學方式，生動活潑，操作過程一目了然，彷彿有電腦老師親自教授　　3.採用最新影音技術製作，無論是在影像、音質、畫面流暢上都保持最佳狀態　　4.主題式教學，可依個人進度選取特定主題學習，並可透過搜尋功能找到相關主題參考，節省時間，學習更完整　　5.提供範例檔案，可同步做練習，不需要自行設計範例，省時有效　　6.豐富的內容，巨細靡遺，絕對可以輕鬆上手，無往不利

書名: Access 2003資料庫管理秘笈
ACCESS進銷存管理系統開發實務經典
書籍簡介: 本書即是以進銷存管理系統為主軸，詳列進銷存相關的功能，並以Access來完成之，使學習者知悉Access功能應用於系統設計時所扮演的角色。　⊕完整的進銷存貨管理系統的設計說明　⊕資料庫於網頁上應用範例的設計說明　⊕關聯式資料庫概念與一般資料文件的電腦化處理　⊕個性化輸出入表單的設計應用　⊕輸出報表、研討會標籤、郵寄明信片的設計列印　⊕各類商務統計圖表的繪製與編修　⊕各類資料查詢功能的設計應用　⊕結構化程式、模組與巨集的設計應用

書名: 活用Access 2002
Organic Chemistry Owl Access Code Card
Succeeding In Business With Microsoft Office Access 2003
活用Access會計管理系統開發與應用
書籍簡介: 會計系統一詞，相信很多人都有相同的經驗，那就是花了大錢請專門人士為公司量身訂做，但往往要花費很多時間溝通整合，而且即使做出來的效果也不見令人滿意；或是在一個公司系統中，常常有多套系統並存在一起，例如進入進銷存系統要輸入一次帳號密碼、進入人事薪資系統時又要再輸入一次帳號密碼等情形，而每套系統幾乎都是以傳統DOS介面呈現方式，不但上手困難，同時也容易造成與其他系統不相容的情況。

書名: 關聯式資料庫Access 2003
書籍簡介: 詳述Access2003的所有功能，並加上國內外最熱門的ER Model實體關係模型的應用，以及資料庫系統與理論，此外，本書亦可以延伸到SQL Server的使用，因為它包含了所有Access 2003所能作到的ANSI SQL語法，是一本適用於初階和進階的書籍。 精采內容： 1.資料及資料庫系統基本觀念2.實體關係模型概念(ER MODEL)3.關聯式資料模型觀念4.建立資料庫與資料表5.關聯式資料庫語言-SQL6.模組與VBA7.關聯資料庫實作設計8.銷售資料庫的實作9. 整合關聯資料庫

書名: Access 2003網路應用
書籍簡介: 十二大特色1. 從Intranet（區域網路）到Internet，由主從式資料庫到Web資料庫架設，所有網路應用清楚交代，一網打盡2. Access安全性機制徹底研究，網路駭客自此束手3. 深入探索複本資料庫自動管理機制，不止Intranet，更上Internetn4. 資料庫分割與複本技術整合應用，高超技巧絕無僅有5. 詳細說明Access專案檔與SQL Server整合技術，內容肯定不含糊6. 強力介紹T-SQL語言，讓您大步邁向SQL Server企業級資料庫7. 完整剖析視圖、資料庫圖表、預存程序與引動程序，技術講解絕不混水摸魚8. 娓娓道出ADO物件與專案檔程式設計，主從式資料庫程式開發從此得心應手9. 為服務無程式設計基礎之讀者，慷慨附贈Access程式設計基本觀念，內容保證精彩(詳於附錄)10. 不止詳細解說資料頁的建構，更告訴您Office Web Component實際應用11. 資料頁發佈實務所有細節、觀念絕不遺漏，Web資料庫架設比人輕鬆12.進銷存系統實例細細解說，終極展示專案檔程式設計實務

書名: Access 2003徹底研究
書籍簡介: ‧這是一本理論與實務並重、觀念與技巧並陳、入門與進階漸進的資料庫入門教材‧直覺易懂的講解，讓艱深的理論人人能懂 ‧詳細圖解的說明，讓複雜的操作步步清楚。如果您想正確學習Access 2003，這一本您不能錯過… 十二大特色：1. 以實做系統為整本書的主軸，直接學習如何建立資料庫，絕不拐彎抹角。2. 完整呈現資料庫系統的分析、設計與實做的過程，一氣呵成。3. 不空泛地講解Access各物件的操作方法，更強調操作技巧背後的原理。 4. 著重Access所有物件的架構觀念，揚棄以各物件為主的介紹方式。 5. 不論是實做系統或者是各物件介紹，完全由淺而深循序漸進。 6. 以淺顯易懂的方式講解資料庫的正規化理論，不僅告訴您如何做？還告訴您為何要這樣做？ 7. 每一個章節可以連貫操作，也可以利用操作範例直接切入任何一個主題。 8. 不止Step by Step，一步驟一插圖，每一步驟清清楚楚。 9. 每章均提供習題，加強讀者印象，並附詳細解答於書後。 10. 徹底研究資料表、查詢…等基本Access物件，而對於較深入的運算式、SQL、事件、模組與VBA，絕不迴避。11. 針對不會寫程式的讀者，特闢專章講解VBA基本語法。 12. 詳細剖析XML技術整合與樞紐分析表/圖的應用，Access功能決不遺漏

書名: 資料庫系統理論－使用Access

	＊入門指南：適合資料庫初學者學習與驗證資料庫相關理論。

	＊學校教材：本書專為一學期18堂課規劃，適合老師作為上課教材使用。

書名: Access 2003實戰問答集
書籍簡介: 針對Access實務應用開發面向，彙集問題之應用全集，書中涵括169個實例個案，是開發人員必備的工具書。◆十大獨立主題：以一問一答的形式，歷經實務經驗進行說明，內容含括資料庫規劃、一般資料庫操作、查詢的設計及應用、巨集及VBA初步、表單設計、報表設計、應用系統設計、整合應用、系統保全、ODBC以及主從架構等。◆提供2000、2002、2003版範例：多數實例均提供2000、2002、2003的範例檔、每一範例均加註適用版本。◆提供Access 2003應用模組集精華檔：光碟內附有六個增益集：基本查詢精靈、萬年曆精靈、撰寫電子郵件、報表微調精靈、基本處理工具精靈、匯出文字檔精靈。

書名: Access實作教材(附範例光碟片)(05722007)
書籍簡介:
這是一本學習Access的好幫手，從認識資料庫的觀念開始，依序介紹各種資料庫物件的基本操作，然後說明如何規劃資料庫、設定關聯，建立量身訂作的查詢；再介紹表單、報表的進階設計，自行設計出一套應用系統。關於樞紐分析表、圖的使用，本書也有很詳盡的說明。最後還介紹了巨集的使用，以便將應用系統修改得更完善。

	 

	◆以循序漸進的方式教您使用Access，從基本的資料庫物件操作開始，到資料表的關聯、設計查詢取得資料、建立進階的表單介面，完成一個綜合的應用。◆簡單地說明資料庫的觀念，並介紹如何進行資料正規化，讓您能夠自行規劃資料庫。◆詳細介紹樞紐分析表、樞紐分析圖的操作，讓您可以自行分析資料。

	◆在書附光碟中附有各章操作的範例檔案，讓您可以跟著步驟一起練習。

	◆每一章的後面有「重點整理」，幫助您熟悉每一章的內容。

	◆每章後面都附有自我評量，可以加強學習效果。

Access 2003私房教師（書＋光碟）
Cisco Access Control Security: AAA Administration Services

書名: ACCESS 2000看了就會
書籍簡介:
看了就會
　◎本書不但適合初學者學習，也適合更版者學習進階的應用。

　◎本書以「用」為導向，講授如何使用軟體，不似傳統僅以「學」為導向的電腦書籍。

　◎每個學習的主題都有獨立性與完整性，可以單獨學習與應用到每一像功能。

　◎每一個學習主題都透過範例解說，讓您學會軟體功能及使用方法。

　◎詳細的範例步驟輔以完整的圖文動作說明，輕鬆學會各主題講授的內容

　◎學習重點，回顧所學內容；評量測驗，找出學習盲點；進而學會書中所有內容。

書名: Access 2003 VBA數位學習系統
資料庫與Access 2003微軟MOS認證主題式
書籍簡介: 本書共分為三部分，每個部分特色說明如下： PART 1 MicrosoftR Office Specialist認證篇 　　1.認識什麼是MOS，並介紹MOS的種類、相關資訊、報名注意事項，以及如何取得MOS認證的步驟與要點等。 　　2.如果您想要參加MOS考試，本篇提供的各種資訊將會是您考前必看的致勝要訣。 PART 2 學習教材篇 　　1.從資料庫系統以及關聯式查詢語言的基本概念與架構開始介紹，再逐步說明Access中的重要物件，進而帶入Access的進階應用，例如資料的匯入／匯出、外部資料的連結，以及如何使用VBA等等。是一本適合資料庫初學者及Access進階使用者嬝牧滷虴驉C 　　2.依據MOS的考試範疇，彙整成十章、共80餘個教學單元。 　　3.明確的主題內容，循序漸進的操作說明以及清晰的實際操作畫面，再配合上附書光碟中的範例檔，以Step By Step方式對Access 2003做深入淺出的解說。 　　4.各章附上「重點摘要」做自我學習的檢視，「實力評量」可以評鑑出學習成果，讓您在最短的時間內學會使用Access 2003的各種操作技巧。 PART 3 模擬試題篇 　　1.提供21個MOS全真模擬考題，每題並附有解題步驟與詳盡的操作畫面，讓您迅速掌握學習重點與得分技巧，幫助您順利通過MOS Access 2003 Specialist專業級認證測驗。 　　2.附書光碟內的「模擬試題篇」資料夾中，提供有本篇中所使用的範例及結果檔案，考生可配合使用以進行每個試題的模擬實戰練習。

書名: Access 2003學習導引手冊
書籍簡介: 這是一本介紹Access 2003整合應用的書籍，除了從頭解釋資料庫的基本概念外，更輔以適當工具(Access)實用的範例讓學生能夠在學習完全書之後，就可以用Access建立與編修班級通訊錄，並且製作合宜之查詢，以學號或姓名搜尋通訊錄內容；再者又可透過Access內建的切換表單，不用寫程式，便可製作出像是點歌系統般專業的表單，徹底學習到Access軟體完整的精華。詳細介紹Access 2003的功能及資料庫的基本觀念，透過範例的實作，讓您逐步熟悉Access的基礎與進階功能，並學習和Office其他成員(如：Word、Excel)間的整合應用，同時擁有紮實的理論架構與正確的工具應用。附件內容書中各章範例檔案及習題解答

書名: 國際性MOS認證觀念引導式指定教材Access Core 2003(標準級)(附光碟)
書籍簡介: 唯一MOS認證指定教材，除指導考試技巧外，亦詳細介紹考試注意事項及提供考場資訊。搭配MOS認證模擬試題，利用本書可幫助考試準備事半功倍。觀念引導式，先建立正確觀念，不論題目如何變化均可舉ㄧ反三，迎刃而解。

書名: 突破Microsoft Office Access 2003

書名: Access 2003私房書
書籍簡介: 本書精彩單元：◎ 實務範例解說，教您量身訂作擁有自我風格的資料工作表，及輕鬆建立美觀的資料表單◎ 完整說明導引，使您擁有整體規劃的關聯式資料庫，及靈活運用查詢功能，馬上取得自己所要的資料◎ 輕鬆製作美觀實用的資料報表及利用「匯入」與「匯出」的功能，讓您的資料也能在其他程式上靈活運用◎ 詳盡說明「資料庫摘要資訊」「尋找工作檔」「自動回復」「資料庫保護」、、等資料庫管理功能，讓您輕鬆管理您的資料庫◎ 對於「Office Web Components」「樞紐分析表」「樞紐分析圖」及網路上運用詳盡介紹，讓您的Access與網路運用更能緊密結合◎ 介紹「合併列印」及「拼字檢查」「自動校正」「資料庫加密/解密」等工具，對於Access 更能靈活操作

書名: 資料庫系統論理與實務－以Access 2003為
書籍簡介: 從資料庫基礎理論出發專為初學者學習資料庫理論而設計，並說明在資料庫系統理論中，常見的資料庫模型、主從架構資料庫系統、ANSI-SPARC三層資料庫系統架構。在關聯式資料庫部分，則說明關聯式資料庫模型、實體關聯模型、實體關聯圖的建立和正規化分析。實例驗證系統開發流程本書使用一個完整的系統開發實例－進銷存系統的【銷售管理系統】，完整地從系統分析、各子功能的建立整合，並且在過程中導入系統建立的重要技巧，進而讓讀者驗證所學的Access操作與關聯式資料庫分析。

書名: 資料庫系統開發聖經－以Access 2003為例
書籍簡介: ◇基礎觀念：說明Access資料庫運作的原理，包括資料表的建置、關聯的建立、如何使用查詢等。 ◇巨集及VBA：善用巨集及VBA可強化應用系統。本書所有範例均使用VBA，並藉由範例來說明其重點及觀念。 ◇介面開發：表單及報表是使用者存取資料庫的介面，也是Access的重點功能之一，因此，本書以大量的篇幅與範例來說明如何製作親和性強的使用者介面。 ◇整合及保全：說明如何將Access開發的應用系統與Outlook、Word、ActiveX等軟體做整合，此外，也提供規劃與保護資料庫的方式，以供開發人員參考。

書名: ACCESS 2003 高手攻略
書籍簡介: 細說如何建置資料表與利用欄位屬性來確保資料的完整性。指導您如何善用索引來提昇效率與連結資料表。真正深入探討選取查詢、動作查詢、與子查詢，讓您成為玩弄資料的高手。藉由專業者與商業價值的角度研究表單與各類控制項的設計技巧。透過眾多實例展現精緻報表與標籤的製作技巧。探討如何利用資料頁構建出符合Internet架構的Database Web應用程式。強力展現Office Web元件的強大功能與效益。一窺Access對XML提供的支援。

書籍簡介: ▓本書專為Access 2003實力養成評量的術科題庫所寫的解題技巧。▓精解術科題庫共4大類40題，包含Access「資料表建構與資料建置」、「查詢類型及設計」、「表單控制項之建立與應用」、「報表設計與控制項運用」等類別，100%掌握作答內容。 ▓「Access 2003實力養成暨評量解題秘笈」需搭配「Access 2003實力養成暨評量」使用。▓操作步驟詳細精解，圖文對照，編排方式清晰易讀，圖解標示操作先後順序，學習過程不致產生錯誤。▓讓讀者在極短的時間內，從學習運用軟體操作到考取證照，一氣呵成。

書名: Absolute Beginner’s Guide to Microsoft Office Access 2003
Dato
書籍簡介: DELMAR AUTOMOTIVE TRAINING ONLINE - DIAGNOSTIC SCENARIOS is a groundbreaking online training program that creates a rich-media learning experience for students by challenging them to learn approved diagnostic and repair practices in 62 realistic scenarios that span all systems areas. By combining strong pedagogy along with real-world experiences, students will improve critical thinking and problem-solving skills through this interactive program. Each scenario addresses a simulated problem on a specific vehicle and teaches students to use an 8-step diagnostic process leading to a successful repair while coaching them with tips. DATO puts students in the role of technicians employed by "All Tech Automotive." It employs Flash animations, a wide variety of interactive features and live-action video to create a simulated but realistic modern repair facility. Students use available tools and diagnostic equipment, animated instrument panels, and service information to diagnose and repair vehicles. This is same approach used by manufacturers to train their own technicians that has been adapted to the needs and expectations of student learners. DATO challenges students to solve real problems on real vehicles from Ford, Chevrolet, Chrysler, Toyota, Honda and Hyundai. DATO minimizes on-screen reading and maximizes student engagement by requiring students to prove that they've done the critical thinking and problem-solving involved in problem diagnosis. DATO Diagnostic Scenarios System Requirements Intel Pentium II 450MHz or faster processor (or equivalent) 128MB of RAM Microsoft Windows Vista, Microsoft Windows XP, Mac OSX 10.5, 10.6 Graphics adapter with Minimum 1024 x 768 display resolution, 32 bit depth Minimum Display Resolution 1024 x 768 Broadband Internet Connection Internet Explorer 6.x, 7.x, or Firefox 2.x, Firefox 3.x, Safari 3.x, 4.x, 5.x Popup blocking software disabled Flash Player 10.x Recommended: Local or Network Printer

書名: Access 2003實戰手冊
書籍簡介:
當我們在有意無意間安裝各種軟體、驅動程式、字型…時，若沒有做良好的管理，往往會造成 CPU 效率降低、記憶體被無效率的佔用，導致電腦變的愈來愈緩慢，效能也越來越低落。以往的解決之道向來只能花上大筆的金錢，購買更快更新的硬體設備來彌補，但卻仍然感覺不出電腦有太大的改變。因此本書將針對如何以現有的有限資源管理您的 Windows 系統，將它調整到最適合您的使用方式，充分發揮電腦應有的功能，讓它恢復應有甚至更為超越的效能。

	 

	Part 1 加快開機速度

	Part 2 加快關機速度

	Part 3 CPU、晶片組、記憶體的效能提昇

	Part 8 提高系統效能的其他方法

	Part 9 提高網路效能

	Part 10 增加系統資源與記憶體

	Part 11 增大可用磁碟空間

	Part 12 徹底解除安裝與殘留項目

Learn the best methods for creating and customizing a new database, retrieving, processing, presenting, and exchanging data, securing your Access environment--and much more.

書名: Microsoft Office Access 2003 Step by Step
資料庫理論Access範例教本
書籍簡介: 專為資料庫的初學者設計，內含資料庫理論的詳盡觀念，解說「關聯式資料庫」、「正規化分析」與「資料庫系統的開發實務」。以各種圖例及表格，說明何謂資料庫理論，後半段再將理論導引至Access，將理論化為實務，建立附合實務需求的資料庫。

書名: Microsoft Office Access 2003 Inside Out
Sams Teach Yourself Microsoft Office Access 2003 in 24 Hours
書籍簡介: In just 24 sessions of one hour or less, the reader picks up all the skills needed to increase the effectiveness and reliability of Access applications. Using a straightforward, step-by-step approach, each lesson builds upon the previous one, allowing the reader to quickly learn the essentials of Access programming from the ground up. The book helps the reader to understand the fundamentals of the Access architecture, gain fast knowledge of the new features that Access offers, learn how to effectively use the latest tools and features of Access by following practical, real-world examples, and get expert tips from the best-selling author, Alison Balter. This book is designed for the way readers learn. They can go through each step-by-step chapter or just choose the lessons that interest them the most.

書名: Access X for Windows: Visual QuickStart Guide
Special Edition Using Microsoft Office Access 2003
書籍簡介: Special Edition Using Access 11 adds new chapters on collaboration with Microsoft SharePoint Team Server, and creating or consuming XML Web services, both of which are hot topics in an otherwise tepid market for Office upgrades. The XML chapter is updated to include Access 11聶s new XML export/import features.The book聶s organization follows the development process for typical Access database applications. Detailed, step-by-step instructions with icons guide readers new to Access through table design, data addition, importing data from external sources, query design and execution, and designing data entry forms and printed reports. Chapters on advanced form and report design emphasize data-entry efficiency and presentation clarity.

書籍簡介:
本書以『書籍』資料庫為範例，教導學生設計資料庫。而在讓學生 實作部分，則使用『DVD』資料庫為例，讓學生可對照課本的做法， 以另一個資料庫來練習。

	 

 本書從基本的資料庫觀念開始，帶領學生認識資料庫，乃至於 資料表、查詢、表單、報表等物件的設計，與網路上的應用。

	 另外更介紹利用實體-關係模型 (E-R Model)，來說明資料庫的 設計方法，並利用正規化的方式來分析資料表，以增進資料庫的 存取效率。

	•資料庫系統簡介•Access 2002 操作環境介紹•建立資料表並輸入、更新與刪除資料•尋找、取代、排序與篩選資料•建立表單與報表•實體-關係模型建立關聯式資料庫•資料表正規化•設計查詢以顯示想要的資料•與 Word、Excel 交換資料•學習巨集指令•建立資料頁，在網路上應用•建立資料庫專案與整合 SQL Server•VBA 輕鬆上手
